review_title: Disappointing. Bad quality. Don’t expect them to look like the picture!
review_text: These were...meh. Not great. :/ I’ll start off with the pros:First off, I love how these are packaged. They are individually wrapped, and the bucket to store them in is cute. They are soft and squishy, don’t smell, and they don’t appear to be overly sticky like other people have stated about other sellers. We did not receive any duplicates. The shapes (or the idea of them?) are decently cute, but there were a lot of flaws in my batch. I nearly gave this 1 star, but I wanted to be fair and give credit to the above good points. Which leads me to the cons....In my batch, there were only a few squishies that had clearly defined paint on the faces (like 3-4, and that’s being generous). The rest of them were sloppy. For the record, I’m not an overly picky gal, but these cross the line. For instance, many of them had eyes that didn’t line up (or were really wonky...kinda like a smear or faint smudge for one eye and another tiny black dot for another) or the nose and eyes were all in a row... like this: . . .  and a lot of other fuzzy/smeared looking paint on the faces, which quite honestly makes most of them weird enough and cheap looking that I don’t want to use these in the goody bags I had planned for Valentines Day for my kid. On top of the ill-defined and, quite frankly, disturbing-looking paint jobs for the faces, there were some weird shaped animals (?!) that we couldn’t figure out what they were. One of them kinda looked like a camel with a blobby horse face, double hump (the humps were not same size...if they were humps?!) with a gaping hole in the back/bum area. A few of them had holes/splits kinda like they were chopped at the end and you can literally insert a finger up them. If the holes/splits weren’t in bum/rear areas of the toys, you could almost use them for finger puppets, but it’s just too embarassing to hand out as gifts or goody bag material. They made us giggle at the wonkiness of it all, though. I’ve never seen more...vague-looking blobby toys with such bad, smeary, minimal paint jobs on the faces in my life. The picture shows them with detailed faces and ours? Not anywhere close.My son was disappointed but tore enough packages open to inspect them and he still likes the texture for squeezing them (he is a special needs child with sensory needs) that I probably won’t return them and just let him have them for himself and buy more elsewhere. It’s really too bad, because they nailed the texture down, no weird chemical smells, no stickiness, packaged well, etc. Bummer!!! :(
category: Toys & Games, Novelty & Gag Toys, Miniatures,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_text: This miniature filing cabinet is stylish and unique.  The item was much larger than expected and holds an incredible amount of business cards.  It takes up a considerable amount of desk-space for me personally, but is a great accessory.  I am sure this clever organizer will be with me throughout my entire career, as it completely removes the clutter of business cards and makes it easy to find the card you are looking for without shuffling through unorganized stacks.In general, I am a fan of miniatures having owned an elaborate dollhouse when I was younger.  I routinely seek out quirky new ways of organizing my items and storing important information that is not digital.  Looking for business cards is enjoyable.  The item is equipped with dividers organized alphabetically.  The three tiers hold A-H, I-P, and Q-Z.  The dividers are removable, so that you can organize them to your preference and cater to the last names (e.g., you will likely have more S names than Z names).  You may shrink or expand any given letter based on the cards that you have.Bottom line:  If you are looking for a conversation piece with plenty of storage for your business cards, you will be happy to have this miniature filing cabinet in your personal office.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_title: I like this more than I thought I would
review_text: I like this more than I thought I would.  It's a cute, but not too cute, addition to my office.  It certainly looks a lot better, and is more functional, than the old Rolodex that it is replacing.My only problem with it is that it is made to fit American business cards.  A standard-sized US business card (3.5" wide) fits the drawer perfectly.  If you have business cards that are slightly larger than standard US ones, they don't fit.  Japanese, Australian, and many European countries are slightly bigger (up to 3.55" wide), which is just large enough to not fit in the drawer.  As I was moving cards into this holder, I had to trim many business cards to fit.  If this case were the tiniest amount wider, it would accommodate those cards without being noticeably larger.If this were slightly larger to accommodate more of the business cards that I receive, it would be five stars.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_title: Cute and functional, hope it lasts!
review_text: I was a little worried upon opening it because this product is made from a lightweight plastic. Be careful with the packaging as I almost threw away the inserts that label the drawer fronts, but it's easy to make your own. The tab dividers are laminated on the front and back which is nice for durability. I filed a 3 inch stack of business cards and this added enough weight that I can pull open a drawer one handed without moving the entire cabinet. It is not precision construction but mine only has extremely minor misalignment that doesn't take away from the look or functionality. It is really fun to have this on my desk and have my full-size filing cabinet below it. I appreciate the little tabs that are built into each drawer as well. When you don't have very many cards yet, this allows you to space out your dividers and cards more so that it's easier to flip through.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_title: Great product idea, seller was responsive
review_text: Pros: comes with lettered index cards that fit the drawers, the mini-cabinet is lightweight, drawers all seemed to be functioning when I first opening it, and it fits far more credit cards and business cards than I expected it to.Cons: seller seemed to have sent me a returned product (box was beaten up and taped shut), the outer label tags were missing the a-h and q-z, and there are a few nicks and scratches on the tops and sides of this.For $25 organizational accessory, I expected it to come in better shape. But alas, I need to use it and there’s no point in wasting the time to send it back.Edit: the seller reached out and sent a replacement after this review, which came perfect, with all pieces and without any surface defects!
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_text: Unfortunately I made an assumption that this mini file cabinet was metal. I searched the page to try to prove this assumption wrong, but found nothing. As much as I hoped it would be metal I opened the box and found a plastic file. Not the greatest first impression, but I reigned in my expectations to a more realistic level. There was a pretty noticeable gap at the top where the back plate attaches to the main cabinet and the middle drawer didn't line up quite right. In an attempt to fix the drawer alignment I broke the handle and the drawer is stuck closed.. This furthered my frustration to the point where I regret ordering this mini file. I don't like leaving negative reviews, and hopefully my experience is just a fluke.. Best of luck to whoever else orders one!
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_text: My wife was tired of seeing the stacks of business cards on my desk so she purchased this as one of my Christmas gifts as a hint to clean them up. Fortunately for me, she organized them alphabetically and all I had to do was put them in. Worked great, cleaned up a lot of clutter on the desk. Now all I have to do is to continue to use it as I collect new cards - I better or she'll probably hit me with it
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_title: So I got one and liked it so much that I decided to get another ...
review_text: So I got one and liked it so much that I decided to get another one. It's perfect for business cards. I am in school and I use flashcards that I print on business cards so it was really nice to have something that size. The first one I got is really great - had no flaws. Unfortunately, the second one I got has a off-center name tag and the box is noticeably warped and its hard to close. I would have given the first one 5 stars and the second one 2-3 stars. I didn't notice the flaws of the second one before I threw out the box (I just assumed it would be as great as the first one) so I can't send it back. If I could, I would have given it 5 stars. The docked star is for the inconvenience of getting a misshapen one (and the inconvenience of sending it back, if I could send it back).
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_text: This is a heavy plastic item. It comes with one set of alphabetical dividers. It is adequate for my uses (filing business cards and membership cards), but it is a little awkward opening the drawers. They are just a little rough and stick a bit. It's also difficult to get to cards in the back of the drawers. On the other hand, it looks great, seems durable, and it has room for credit cards sized cards. (I like to keep my hotel, airline, etc. membership cards filed.)
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_title: Item design O.K. made of poor quality materials.
review_text: While the design is fine, the construction is not....Made out of thin plastic...drawers do not slide easily...not sufficient weight so when one pulls out drawer of cards the whole holder tips over.One solution is to glue the item to a desktop ( double back tape) . Suction cups built into the system might also work....I took a 12" piece of pressed wood (3/4" thick) and glued it to the holder...then set the whole system on my desk....I can now use it by pulling out the drawers with one hand and thumbing through the cards with the other....I would have sent it back but had filled on drawer full of cards and didn't want to undo my work....
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Card Files, Holders & Racks, Business Card Holders,

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer

product_title: Mini File Cabinet Business Card Holder 3-Drawer
review_text: This is a decent cabinet but I wouldn't really recommend this product. It almost feels like a child's toy because of the type of plastic used. This is unfortunate because I have a tendency of easily knocking it over with how light it is. If it was a heavier type, like a metal alloy, I wouldn't have had this issue. The drawers come out just fine, however the handle can pop off easily so beware. I have been unable to fit most business cards in this cabinet. I am currently using it as a receipt holder, however it is relatively small for this purpose as well. If it was a bit larger, I would have knocked it up a star, but I have to give three stars in terms of stability and functionality.

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_text: I've been using this folder for nearly 2-3 months and I'm a college student with a lot of papers to carry. I was looking for something cute, easy to carry, that fits manila folders, and overall keeps folders from getting crinkly. This DID IT. I can't express how much I love this -- I got a second one that is coming very soon! As I mentioned, I use manila folders for A LOT of things and even the divider for them is just below the strap that keeps the folder closed. Nothing gets crinkled or bent and it is great. I can throw loose leaf papers, folders, or even books/small notebooks in here. It's adorable and a great color as well. Take a look at the pics -- I highly recommend this folder (I got a lot of compliments on it as well!)
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Filing Products, File & Folder Accessories, File Jackets & File Pockets, Expanding File Jackets & Pockets,

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_text: It's super cute. It'll get the job done.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Filing Products, File & Folder Accessories, File Jackets & File Pockets, Expanding File Jackets & Pockets,

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_title: If it suits you, buy it!
review_text: I absolutely loved this! At first I debated whether or not I was actually going to use this in my day-to-day school life. I have always been the type of person to have a folder for every single subject in school, and buy new folders every semester because they would generate wear and tear by the end of the term. It also becomes too troublesome when you become a college student and you have to switch out notebooks and folders everyday in order to not carry everything for every class even if you don't have that particular class that day. On bad days you may tend to forget a particular folder for a class that you have that day. So, I found this file folder and decided to give it a try after searching for the right one for me. After 4 months of continuous use, it held up really well! It held everything that I needed and it was always by my side, it actually still looks somewhat new and still usable. review_text: I absolutely love the color of this file folder in green. After using the same beat up folder for years to store my pets veterinary information, I decided it was time for a change when we adopted a new kitten.This file folder is great. It's just the right size for my needs, and the snapping lock ensures that all of the information on my kitty will be in a safe and secure place. Obviously, this folder can be used for just about any purpose. It doesn't hold a lot, but it's quite sufficient for storing my pets records. Since it comes with several separate compartments, it's useful for categorizing your information.The bottom line is that this expanding file folder is very well made, beautiful to look at, and extremely useful. The separate compartments make it quite versatile as well.

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_text: I bought this to hold all the paperwork pertaining to my new puppy and it works just fine. Expands easily & the tabs are large enough to write on without breaking out your fine pencil & magnifying glass. It does feel cheap though. I feel like the buckle will break off at some point. I also wish the print with the smiley face wasn't on the front. That gives it the feel that I stole this from my middle school nieces backpack.Overall, it works very well for what I need it to do. Hold papers. Plenty of various tabs for categories and I don't foresee running out of space in this. I would recommend.

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_text: Received this item in a safe packaging! It had a sleeve pocket over it to keep it from getting scratched in transport. The image on the front doesn’t seem to come off easily, I scratched it to see if it was on there good & it was! It’s such a cute pink with a mint color. Over all it seems to hold up great & fits normal standard paper. The edging is on the plastic file good enough so it wouldn’t fall apart, unless you pull very hard it will come undone. The only flaw that’s on the file it self is the button that keeps the file closed, it’s displaced a little higher than it’s supposed too, but I don’t mind it one bit. It’s still a great & super cute  file for important papers or other papers in general!
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Filing Products, File & Folder Accessories, File Jackets & File Pockets, Expanding File Jackets & Pockets,

review_text: I like this organizer, but not the little FOB saying on the front that says "keep smiling every time" It would be perfect without it. It is kind of embarrassing using this at school or work because it is not professional enough. Even so, I like the pockets and it seems to be holding up my documents and papers pretty well...for now.

review_title: Received bent, and with an ugly logo stamped on the back
review_text: It seems like a decent file folder, functionally speaking. It’s got files and a snap to hold your letter sized paper in place. However, the item I received was bent, like someone sat on it.Aesthetically: the color selection is fun, and the kawaii happy face is iridescent. But the back of the folder has the “SKYDUE” name stamped on the back. The photo of the item didn’t depict this, and it’s an eyesore whose very presence on the otherwise clean, streamlined design is enough to be a dealbreaker (in addition to the fact that it was bent), so I’m returning it.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Filing Products, File & Folder Accessories, File Jackets & File Pockets, Expanding File Jackets & Pockets,

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_title: Does not fit on shelf as pictured
review_text: The product is satisfactory for storing papers, however I purchased this item expressly because the images showed them fitting upright on a shelf (which would allow you to organize and access them like pulling a book off a shelf).  They DO NOT fit any standard shelves I have.  They are at least an inch taller than any standard three-ring binder.  Unless you plan to put them in a filing cabinet, I don't see the use for paying $8.99 for this item.  It's not secure enough to keep smaller papers from falling out if you just carry it around, and it doesn't fit on a shelf as advertised.

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_text: I really love these expanding file folders and have purchased several and always try to grab one or two more when I see them at a good discounted price.  They are perfect for my filing my paperwork related to my home business and has enabled me to switch from multiple "pee-chee" type folders to one file folder that does the same job as 10 individual folders.  So a HUGE time and space saver since I am not having to sort through several folders to find the one I need.  Now I can just grab a file folder associated to the year I need to access and it's easy peasy.  I can see these being a benefit to high school and college students as well for keeping projects and classwork organized and prioritized.  I definitely would recommend these to friends and family.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Filing Products, File & Folder Accessories, File Jackets & File Pockets, Expanding File Jackets & Pockets,

product_title: Skydue Letter A4 Paper Expanding File Folder Pockets Accordion Document Organizer (Yellow)
review_text: I really love this folder! I got it in pink, so it's really cute and matches my whole life aesthetic. Additionally, I'm a biology major taking 24 hours of class a week with labs and this thing holds so many freaking papers. SO many. Like I regret my previous system of a folder for each class, this is clearly superior and awesome. What really threw me over the top for this thing was its ability to keep all my papers like 90% dry. I had class during Hurricane Michael and it was raining super heavily with wind and I was wading through like a foot of water to get to class. When I opened up my backpack, everything inside was soaked through; it was disheartening. I pull this folder out thinking "Ok well all my professors are getting soggy papers today that's what they get for making me go to class in this mess" but when I pulled my papers out they were dry! All of them! Maybe a few had some soggy spots but like 95% of my stuff in this was perfectly safe. Highly recommend buying this.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Filing Products, File & Folder Accessories, File Jackets & File Pockets, Expanding File Jackets & Pockets,

product_title: Cute 3D Cartoon Wooden Galesaur Pushpins for Corkboard / Decrorative Thumb Tacks Set of 5 PCS
review_title: Quality too poor to be $8.99 for 5 pins!!
review_text: This is such a big waste of money, and I really don't understand the high reviews. The wood feels cheap and not in that satin/well-polished y finish like in the photo. There was literally only 5 pins. They looked super cheap. I'm normally not one to leave negative feedbacks as I rarely buy things with low reviews or things I haven't done enough research in. This thing is NOT worth $8.99. They sell these for like maximum $3 in China or on Ebay. But it does look quite cute. I think this is an okay item for a kids room that you know you will move out of in a few years or you will renovate soon. But this is definitely not an item that will last with repeated use.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Tape, Adhesives & Fasteners, Pins & Tacks,

review_title: they are the perfect size, and fit my panda love with my ...

I recently decided I needed a cork bulletin board to get organized and how could I resist these cute little panda push pins to cheer up my busy board??I looove them, they are the perfect size, and fit my panda love with my adult/organizational needs!!  Highly recommend.They are well made, adorable AND have already gotten compliments!

review_title: I just received mine and love it but the title is misleading
review_text: I just received mine and love it but the title is misleading. It states "Mini Air Diffuser Portable Aroma Humidifier" So, I bought thinking I could add oils. This should be removed from the title as it is not safe to use with oils. I still love it and will use it but just disappointed.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Turn your cube farm into a spa - air-wise
review_text: I love this little humidifier so much. It's super dry in our cube farm and having this plugged into my computer on the deck about a foot from me is awesome.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: This humidifier is absolutely adorable. I purchased it to put near my houseplants that needed some extra humidity. It looks adorable near them and I can already see a difference in my plants after just a weeks worth of turning it on once a day. It's relatively easy to use to start I soaked the cotton as recommended before putting it into the machine. I then filled it with water turned it on and you could see the mist coming out. It does have a good size water basin for its size. My only complaint is you have to unplug it in order to remove the top to refill it.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: Really shoddy quality. Three days into using it and the inside piece that holds the wick broke off and I can no longer use it. I had not removed it since the first day when i had to pre soak the wick and upon refilling the water today found it had completely broken off. It’s cute, but consider purchasing something that’s actually made well.Edit: there is also a high pitched noise when the diffuser was working. (some may not be able to hear it, but I could)
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: I love this. I use it at my desk at ...
review_text: I love this. I use it at my desk at work and I've gotten so many compliments on it too. It was really easy to set up and I can use it throughout the day without having to refill it. My only complaint is that if you have to fill it a little bit short of the maximum capacity line because it will overflow at the line. Other than that this is so great, I can even see a difference in my skin on my face.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I got this little humidifier for my desk at work after seeing that a coworker had one.  I get really painfully dry sinuses in the winter, so I was borrowing it all the time.  This one works really well and puts out a good amount of cool water vapor for its size, and lasts a surprisingly long time on one fill.  I got the pink version, which looks like it might be a slightly rose gold color and metallic, but it's more of a baby pink and plastic.  I wasn't hung up on the color or material, though, so it's not an issue for me.  I think the only thing that could bother a purchaser about this item is that the instructions are mostly in Chinese, with illustrations and bare-minimum supplemental instructions in English.  I had no trouble following them, but my coworker who bought it before me didn't understand the step that you have to have the base and the lid aligned in a certain way to turn it on.  It's also important to bear in mind that this is a small humidifier, so you will only notice a difference if you have it within a few feet of you.  Additionally, it is a cool vapor humidifier, so it may make the air in its vicinity feel colder.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Cute and a lot of mist!
review_text: I just received it and set it up and it worked right away and is putting out a lot of mist.  It is smaller than I though (see picture with pen), but my fault for not paying attention to dimensions.  It cycles through the colors quite nicely.  The only issue I see is that it is not clear how to open up the tube to replace the filter.  I'll cross that bridge when I come to it and update how it is going.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: This thing is easy to set up
review_text: This little thing did wonders for my skin in my office. I'm right next to a window so I often have to run my space heater which dries the daylights out of my skin. This thing is easy to set up, well worth the money, and super cute. My eyes and nose stay moisturized and my skin looks better than it ever does in the winter. It's made for small spaces, so make sure you're within a foot or two of the mist so you can benefit fully.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: Definitely works, takes very minimal space from your working area. Connects directly to the USB port on my monitor.Small water reservoir but should be enough for a period of 4 hours. I do keep a bottle of water in case it runs out. Only 1 button to turn on/off, adjust the lighting feature.With the price, I think this is a decent portable humidifier to purchase. Also, it will be a good gift for anyone who needs a humidifier in their office :)
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I love it, it is so cute even when I don't use it it looks adorable in my interior. Pretty easy to use and refill, even though having to remove the USB to open and refill is sometime annoying but it is still very quick.At first I was worried to let it on with the automatic shut off cause they say to make sure there is enough water but I tested and realized you can apparently do 2 times 4 hour with one refill! Pretty neat.Now I am happy I bought it cause once again cute, but it is not the most effective humidifier let be honest. I first bought it for work but keep it at home and so I think my room is "too big" to get all the benefits, but it is ok. It is pretty small to take it and move it anywhere.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: This is so cute and it does a great job putting out steam,  only problem is the mist falls back down to my desk and leaves a dew all around which isn't great for a work space.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: Very cute and looks nice on my desk. I like that it's small enough to sit next to me without taking up so much space. It does emit a quiet hissing sound, so...be aware of that. I'm taking off two stars because it has an auto shut off that can't be changed (it's like....2 or 3 hours I think?) and It has a tendency to clog and stop working. If you tap it a little it starts again, but...something just isn't quite right about the design or something.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: This is adorable on my desk at work! It has a decent run time but does have a few quirks to get used to.  I find it works best to only fill it about halfway or three forceful versus going all the way to the max line. Also it comes with a little filter stick and you need to soak that in the water before you turn it on otherwise it’s not going to run immediately and you’ll think it’s broken. Lastly, make sure you line up the dots on the top and the bottom because it’s hard to twist once it’s in place.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I bought this to use at work for my dry contacts and migraines. It really works helloing keep my contacts from drying out as I work in a hospital. I have found my migraines haven’t been as severe as they were prior to using my Cactus. And much to my surprise it’s been a moral booster with my nurse co-workers.! If I have it off or one day I didn’t use it because my laptop crashed they all wanted to know where the cactus was!
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: No Auto-Turn Off + Too Small Reservoir
review_text: This little guy is adorable and does what it's built to do. My main issue is that it's reservoir is small in combination with the fact that it doesn't auto-shut off when it's empty. One or the other needs to be fixed, preferably the auto-shut off. The other issue is there was a defect with the filter. Cannot remove the piece that holds it in without breaking it. So when the first filter is done, the entire thing is trash. Would not recommend or buy again.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I just love this little 'bunny blower' - lol. My world is about 25 SQ ft of dry desert air and I have frequent nosebleeds. Next to my pillow, the cool mist made a huge difference. I love the color changing LED light plus the ability to just have mist and no light. An automatic timer turns lights off and then mist before wick runs dry.My only complaint would be that I did not receive the email from wick.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Cute, works pretty well. SOAK STEM, THOUGH
review_text: Super cute. I use it on my desk at work and it puts out a ton of steam. My only problem would be the instructions I received were in Chinese. It took me quite a while to realize that before it will work, you have to soak the cotton stem to make anything happen. You can't just put it in and have it work. I gifted one to my mom and she had the same problem. But once it's in, it's good. It also kind of sucks that if you leave water in for too long, it will get musty and moldy. So either take the stem out to dry it if you won't use it for a few days, or find out how to get replacements.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: its the perfect size for personal use wherever you need it! I use mine next to my bed at night on the night stand, and in my car. It fits nicely in my cup holder compartment, the cable is a decent length too! I will order more in the future, my daughter loves how cute they are! Over all I am very happy with this purchase and that there are refill packages of the cotton core available as well.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I bought this to use in my snakes enclosure for the dry winter time that happens in the Midwest. It works well for her enclosure, I just wish that it would emit humidity until there was no longer any water in the tank. It also runs in 2 hour increments instead of 4 like it advertised. Still great product though.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: This is the cutest little thing ever.
review_text: Mine is currently sitting on my desk attempting to combat the dryness from using a space heater in the office (weather in the North is rough!) If it's full I'd say it goes steady for 3 hours or so before needing to refill it (benefits include: getting up and away from the desk a couple times a day, multi-tasking and using that time to fill up your water bottle and staying uber hydrated!). FOUR stars because I wish it had an intermittent setting, instead of just being either ON or OFF.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: Even though it's a cute product it has a poor design.Worked strong for about 3 hours and I needed to refill it. The lid fits tight but doesn't fit properly and it's an uneventful fit. review_text: This worked awesome at first but a few weeks in it started malfunctioning - at first the light would stay on and the humidifier part would stop working I would turn it off and back on and it would work fine for a bit. product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: It is adorable, but I did not get the design I ordered. The box showed the correct design, but the humidifier was the pink bunny (ordered the white deer, which was on the box). I like the colour-changing light, and it is compact enough that it fits nicely on my desk.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Great price and does the job!
review_text: This is the cutest little humidifier I’ve ever seen! Our office is super dry. I wear contacts so my eyes are constantly irritated and I spend most of the day putting eye drops in my eyes. I’ve only had this for a day and I’ve already noticed a difference! I haven’t had to put my drops in yet! I’ve been getting so many compliments from my coworkers. It is really great for the price and does what it is intended to do! Also love that it plugs right in to my computer. If you are looking for a cheap solution to dry office air at your desk, this is perfect!
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I bought this for my desk in my office at work because it's been so dry in here! I always have a space heater going too, which I believe can just make this winter air drier and harsher. So I got this little guy for my desk and it is perfect! Puts a great amount of cool mist into the air. I got the one with the soft light too, it's so cute. It's very quiet and lasts almost the whole day. I usually fill it once in the morning and refill around lunch-time or so. It's wonderful!

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown

review_text: I needed a small humidifier for work because my office is very dry making my sinuses a mess. Started using this humidifier and I can breathe again! Small and easy to use. I also added a couple drops of lavender essential oil and it works great.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Only good for like 3 uses tops
review_text: I am on my second one of these because my first had the exact same problem I’m now having with my second one. The first few times I used this, it worked great. But now, nothing is coming out of it anymore. I’ve tried replacing the filter, making sure the filter is wet all the way thru, shaking it, putting the filter in securely, putting it in less securely, and nothing will get this to work. It looks cute, but I absolutely would not recommend buying it because it breaks so easily and that doesn’t seem to be a fluke.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: So just to set the record straight, this is a humidifier not an oil diffuser. That being said the water chamber holds quite a bit of liquid and I added a few drops of essential oils to the water a few days ago and have had no issues with it clogging of malfunctioning. It also came with an extra cotton tube that acts like a sponge to get the steam pumping, for when the first gets dirty. It is USB adaptable which is nice but full disclosure It must be plugged in. The product is completely silent and really helps in spaces with pets.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Worked great for a week then died
review_text: I purchased this item for my office and for the first few days it worked perfectly.  The first weekend after bringing it to work I left it on my desk empty and unplugged so it could dry out.  Now it won't turn back on.  The light is on showing power to the diffuser, but it will not turn on after multiple attempts and unplugging and re-plugging it in.  I am sad about it because it is really cute and worked so great the first few days.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I've only had this for about a week, but I'm pretty happy with it. It's small and looks adorable on my desk. I've gotten tons of compliments. It's very easy to set up and use.The output of mist is not bad. I didn't expect much from such a small device. It's most effective if you can keep it closer to you.As others have mentioned, it must be unplugged to refill it. All of the mechanism is on top, so this makes sense. It's probably also safer, you know, because water and electronics?While I'm generally happy with this, I do have an issue and I'm not sure if it's just my humidifier or if others have experienced this as well. I only use filtered or distilled water but this thing puts out a funky smelling mist when I first turn it on for the day. It could be the material in the cactus, but it's a pretty funky B.O.-like smell. If I could use this thing as a diffuser it might cover up the smell, but I can't so I spend the first half of my work day worried that people can smell it.All in all, I'm pretty happy with this stinky little cactus. As long as it works, I'm pretty happy with it.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Great size, perfect for my desk.
review_text: So far it's working great, it's the perfect size for my desk where I can put it right in front of my face.  I bought this because in the winter months, it gets very dry and my skin dries out pretty bad and I also get very severe sinus headaches, so I'm hoping this will help.  The mist "power" is also great (see pic) - it doesn't just barely sputter out - and it's a nice touch to have the changing colors.  What's also nice is that it doesn't seem to leave a layer of water on my desk like I was worried about.However, I only gave it 4 out of 5 stars because personally I would like to be able to change the "amount" of the mist that comes out as needed, and also, the changing colors is somewhat unnecessary - I'd rather them change out that feature for being able to adjust how much mist comes out.  Otherwise, it's working fine so far.  I also can't tell how to change the filter/soft tube when the time does eventually come, which makes me wonder if I'll break it when I try.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I really like it for my desk and I feel like it really helps with they dry air. My skin and nasal passages feel so much better with it on. all my co-workers love it, I had to share the link with them.I've only used it a week, it seems to be doing fine. I do worry about the cotton wick and how long it lasts and keeping it clean. It smelled a little musty today but I soaked it in a little alcohol and it seems fine. One fill pretty much lasts the whole work day for me. Granted I'm not always at my desk, and it does turn itself off after a while.  usually by the time I leave its dry inside but I may need open it and let it dry over night to prevent the musty smell.It is also working fine with just the filtered water.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I really wanted to give this five stars - it's adorable, puts out a surprising amount of mist for the size and is pretty quiet. I docked it one star because the recommendation was to soak the soft piece before first use (they also give you a spare), but I could not figure out how to get the hard outer shell and the soft piece (which comes pre-assembled) apart. I felt like I was going to break the machine trying to wrench them apart. I started it just fine without pre-soaking the piece. We'll see how that holds up.You'll need to fill it slightly below the "max fill" line or it will leak out when you put the top part in.Also, the directions are entirely in Chinese. The photos aren't really of assistance. There isn't that much set up required, but perhaps that would have told me how to get the pieces apart to pre-soak them. Oh well. Still a great little humidifier for my cubicle.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: Got this for my desk at work and it works perfectly.  Better then I had even hoped for.  I was having problems with dry eyes at the office, my wife bought this and now I have no issues a the office.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: So cute I'm buying a second one
review_text: Just got this yesterday and I'm thrilled with it. Read the instructions on Amazon as English instructions were not included in the box (however my box included cute little stickers to customize the double cactus humidifier). So happy with it, I've already placed another in my cart for my husband's office and I'm considering adding a couple more for our bedrooms.I like that you can see the water level and that the light has so many options (one color, variable colors, or no light). I'm also pleased that the wick is reusable, not disposable.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: I actually am pleasantly surprised at how well this works. It's a very small little humidifier that packs a lot of punch (however you do have to have it within a foot of you to really get the benefits). It's super cute and has a nice glow light that is great for nighttime. I keep this plugged in at my desk for work for at least 6 hours and I don't need to refill the water all that much. It also auto-shuts off after 4 hours which is a great feature, because I'd definitely forget to turn it off. Plus, it looks great on my desk.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_text: My work station is directly underneath a heating vent that can’t be closed or redirected, and I’ve been feeling dried out and tired. This lil cactus has been a cheap and easy solution; I have more energy, and I’ve noticed I’m using less moisturizer on hands and face.It will last through a work day with a full tank in the morning and does shut off automatically after a few hours; however, it does not shut off automatically if the tank runs dry and the filter dries out and gets quite hot, so keep an eye on it!
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: A little confusing at first but beautiful.
review_text: I love this little machine. Its very cute, it was a little confusing at first. I took the top off and the straw holding the cotton and the spring fell out. I had to look at the pictures to put it back together. After reading the Mandarin Chinese instructions (English instructions is very limited) I got everything figured out. review_title: Cute - but prepare to McGyver it to use it more than once.
review_text: This thing is so darn cute I decided to order it even though others have complained about it. I should have listened. Worked great on Friday, but today I sit down to refill it and I CANNOT GET THE TOP OFF! I pulled, I pried, I cursed, and finally, the green cactus pulled off but the piece was still stuck in the center. I had to cut the slot off the front and use a palette knife to pry it out.  Now I have two pieces of scotch tape holding up the white central core from sliding into the grey water reservoir,  it works now but I'm still disappointed it the design.  Photo shows the aftermath of my attempts to pry the center out.

review_title: Works well with a couple flaws.
review_text: I love this little guy! It works just as it should, and it’s the cutest little thing.My only two complaints are that it times off a bit quick. I’d personally prefer it to just run until it runs out of water. But it’ll time off twice before the thing is done with it’s water and essential oils. My second complaint is that the screws on the inside do get rusty and kinda grimey. It’s a little gross and I have to clean it out every few uses, but I don’t mind all that much.Overall it’s very cute and a nice way to give a room a nice sent (I use it since candles aren’t allowed in a college dorm). It always works well, but the quality could be better.

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown
review_title: Best Thing In A Dry Office
review_text: Plagued with a head cold from hell, I knew I needed a moister climate than what my office was going to be to get better. I bought this little guy with a hope and a prayer and was not disappointed. It comes with a filter already installed and a spare. I filled up my cup, sat the mister part in for 45 minutes to soak as instructed and then turned it on.This is a cold mist and it really does the trick with keeping your cubicle humidity up enough not to dry out your sinuses. I have actually forwarded the link to this item to 4 people in my office. It doesn't make anything feel wet, even right under the cactus, just cold. The on and off switch in the back is nice to turn it off when I leave the desk for a meeting or lunch so it's not just constantly running. One fill of the cup lasts about 4 continuous hours of mist.I would definitely buy this again.
category: Home & Kitchen, Heating, Cooling & Air Quality, Humidifiers & Accessories, Humidifiers,

product_title: AmuseNd USB Cool Mist Humidifier, Mini Size Cactus Humidifier for Bedroom Home Office Car 280ml 50ml/h with Timed auto Shutdown

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Chic make up organizer! Saves space!
review_text: I am beyond satisfied with these drawers! I ordered a few units and since they are stackable, they save a lot of space on my vanity. I store all my makeup and am able to separate eyes, lips and face, keeping everything very organized. The clear drawers make it easy for me to find what I'm looking for. :-DTip. I viewed quite a few videos on YouTube on makeup storage suggestions. These drawers are very popular on there and watching a video rather seeing a picture gave me a better perspective on the size of the drawers and what they could hold.I'm extremely happy with this purchase and will buy more in the future!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Deep drawers, good for larger products.
review_text: I am very happy with this purchase! I've recently started organizing my makeup on my bathroom counter instead of keeping it all in a travel organizer. I came across this 3 drawer organizer after my first purchases of counter organizers (from a different company) were not deep enough to hold my foundation and powders. From the pictures you can see that these drawers hold the Kat Von D Lock-It Tattoo Foundation and the Ben Nye Banana Powder (both on their sides). I found that these drawers slid in and out very easily with limited friction. The drawers come completely out which helps when they are packed full of makeup. They do not hold the Naked pallettes or my larger MAC shadow pallattes. It didn't take long to fill these three drawers up! This organizer is very reasonably priced and I would recommend this product to others looking to organize their makeup as well :)
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Great for cleaning up your desk!
review_text: Excellent little box for storing things on a desk. I had a completely chaotic desk and needed something to restore my sanity and my workspace. I combined this with a larger chest (http://www.amazon.com/Ikee-Design-Acrylic-Jewelry-Cosmetic/dp/B00DUJEWDE/ref=cm_cr_pr_product_top?ie=UTF8) and couldn't be happier. This unit is clear so it's easy to see what's inside, and the drawers are surprisingly roomy, and fit standard pens and pencils with ease. I took back one star because there is some light scuffing on the front of one of the drawers, but it's not too noticeable and I know that acrylic is very scratch-prone anyway.Overall, I'm super happy with this purchase!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Sturdy construction and tons of storage.
review_text: I love this set of drawers. I recently covered my old, worn down green desk with marble contact paper. My old navy blue drawers with green handles just did not match anymore and I sought a replacement. These fit the bill perfectly! Not only do they match, the drawers are far deeper and hold more than the old set (which I purchased over a decade ago at Target). I have tons of stuff stored in the drawers and I can fit much more. I have tons of washi tape and I love that all my favorites can fit in one of the drawers on their sides so I can see the prints (see pic). I definitely recommend these drawers and I will likely be buying more!!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: I love this 3 Drawer Storage Organizer
review_text: I love this 3 Drawer Storage Organizer, White and am very pleased with my purchase! I needed something to free up some of the cabinet space for my fiancé. I got the solid white so the feminine products I store in it are more discretely out of the way, organized, and quickly accessible. The drawers slide nicely and quietly. It was worth the extra cost to get these rather than the comparable Sterilite organizer.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: As some other people have said, mine came with massive smudge marks on 4 of the sides, but the smudges are underneath the finish making it impossible to wipe off.  Strangely, I noticed the smudges are only on the sides that were covered by the plastic protective covering that the item comes in.  The other two sides are not damaged.  The item is also made of pretty cheap and pretty light material and the drawers don't even fit or slide particularly well.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I searched far and wide for a little organizer that would fit on my oddly shaped shelf in my bathroom.  I finally found these and though I was worried about the quality, decided to take a chance.  I'm so glad I did!  They are cute, free of scratches, and the perfect size to hold my makeup.  The only thing that doesn't fit perfectly inside of these drawers is some longer sticks of eyeliner, but they do fit if you place them in the shelf diagonally.  I have multiple shapes of bottles of foundation, powder, concealer, blush, mascaras, lipsticks, etc.I will mention that many eyeshadow palettes will not fit in here--please refer to the item dimensions if you are planning on using these for Naked or similarly shaped palettes.  They will not fit.  I have a little bit of wiggle room on the sides of these organizers so I stick them between the organizer wall and shelf wall.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: Again, another great storage idea from InterDesign. I like that it holds a multitude of stuff, which is easy to see from the outside. No mistaking where anything is and can certainly be found in a rush ... if you're like me!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Looks great but I wish they were a little bigger
review_text: -I purchased 2 of these as makeup organizers. I love the look of them and they fit in great with the rest of my clear acrylic organizers. I had no problems with sliding in/out any of the drawers.-The are about 6 in' across all edges, so it's a pretty good square shape and I have 2 of them next to each other with another organizer atop of them. They will not fit longer brushes, but I had no issues with my mascaras, eyeliners, lipliners, etc.-I only wish that rather than having 3 drawers, that there were 2 instead. While it looks great, the height of the three drawers is a little awkward in terms of stacking compacts or blushes on top of each other. Just having a bit more depth in the drawers, would maximize my organizing if I were able to to fit things like my tarte cheek stains upright rather than on its side, or my tilt my blushes to the side rather than have to stack 2.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Makeup storage for a small bathroom
review_text: I purchased 2 of these drawers with the intent of makeup storage.  I wanted something to organize my makeup in our small bathroom, as well as, something better looking than a makeup bag sitting on the counter.  I had a difficult time finding something just the right size to fit on a floating shelf that wasn't see through plastic.  The drawers work just for what I intended; however, I must say that I don't think that the product quality is good for the price point.  The plastic is rather cheap and the drawers don't always go in smooth or close properly due to the weight of the items in the drawer.  I purchased both drawers as warehouse deals and definitely would have been disappointed if I would have purchased them at full price.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I ordered 2 sets of 4 boxes each in March 2016 so I could organize my cookie cutters and other baking tools. They are perfect for that ! I was able to organize them by Holidays/Events. So much easier to find them and only pull out the drawer(s) that I need. I cut out a few colored foam sheets (I got them from the local Walmart in the craft section) to fit the bottom of each drawer, so they don't get scraped or scratched easily from the metal cookie cutters.I am back now to order 16 more boxes to try to organize my ever growing collection of cookie stencils, cookie cutters and fondant tools. I just wish they came in bigger sizes so I could fit more. Some of the brushes and dipping tools don't fit as they are bigger than 7 inches. Some fit diagonally inside the drawer.If you are planning on buying several at a time, buy them in sets of 4, they are better packaged and scratch free. I haven't had any damaged organizers.

Also, I hate how it doesn't fit most of my eyeshadow palettes (like the naked palettes, smashbox full expose, lorac), but it gives you the dimensions of the drawers, so it doesn't bother me.Overally, its appealing to have out on the vanity, and it's good storage. product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I absolutely love these drawers!  They hold products very well and are made of sturdy plastic.  The knobs are easy to push and pull making the drawers work with ease.  They are completely clear which really helps when looking for items or trying to find something- you don't always have to open the actual drawer.  All drawers are the same size and they are on the smaller side so expect to put smaller products inside.  Make sure to measure so you know for sure what you are getting.  The only thing I wish they had was a diver on the top so they would stack and stay in place easily.  I stacked mine but they do move if I slam the door etc- it would be great if they had something built in that made them stackable.  Overall they have really helped me organize my makeup and I love the look.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Stackable, holds a lot, helps to free up dresser/counter space.
review_text: I purchased one of these in clear, and a set of 4 in pink.  They came in mostly great condition.  I wiped them down with a towel as they were a little dusty.  I stacked them on top of my dresser to store make up and hair accessories.  Each drawer holds more than it would appear by the look of it.  Since they worked well, we got a set in blue for the bathroom.  It helps to stack them and make more space on a small counter.As with any plastic, there are some scratches and marks on them, but no cracks or anything significantly wrong.  My only complaint is that one of the pink drawers has a dark spot at the bottom where something got stuck in it during molding, and there are a few air bubbles around it.  Honestly, it looks like an insect or something got stuck in the plastic.  Luckily it is at the bottom and not noticeable, because I didn't want to return the whole set just for that.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Clear drawers to Clear your mind!
review_text: Note: Be Very aware this product is not as thick/hard/solid as other acrylic products. Between the warehouse and shipping my drawers came with a crack on the top right side and the bottom right in back was chipped. Maybe the shipping tag should have a "Fragile" stamp on it.  This could have been a 5 star item.  Not worth the trouble to return. It's doing the job.Wow! These drawers are definitely a space/lifesaver:). Small enough to sit on the bathroom counter on the ledge, sturdy where you can open without collapsing, clear so you can see your products and not fumble through a makeup bag or kaboodle. My faves and everyday essentials are stored in the 3 drawers as follows:TOP drawer has 13 eyeshadows, MAC, Maybelline, loreal, 2 Loreal mascaras, eyeshadow primerMIDDLE - Covergirl trublend mineral bronzer, Maybelline mineral power finishing veil, 4 milani blushes, 2 MAC blushesBOTTOM - 2 Maybelline Fit Me Foundations, 3 BB creams, 2 lancome blushesProbably will order again to see if the drawers were damaged during delivery. I really like the drawers minus the cracks.Well organized and efficient. Looks good on the bathroom counter.

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Nice little storage system for my cosmetics!
review_text: As my makeup collection has grown I realized my storage solution (throwing everything in a gigantic cosmetic bag) was not optimal. It was so hard to rummage through the contents of the bag to find the specific item I needed. Not to mention that sometimes my eyeshadow pots or pallets would open up in the bag and there would be powder all over everything. Ugh!I saw some clear acrylic boxes online called Muji and I really loved the idea of a storage system that could sit on my counter, that was clear so I could easily see what I wanted to use, and that had drawers. Unfortunately, the Muji drawers in the system I wanted were too shallow and the item was on backorder. So I came to Amazon to see what I could find here.There were so many high-priced systems but I didn't want to pay too much and then not be satisfied. So I saw these and thought they were just the right size to fit the space on my counter and the drawers were slightly deeper than the Muji drawers. Also, the price was in line with my budget and I figured it would be a cheap experiment.I read reviews for the product and was slightly apprehensive because a lot of customers said the drawers arrived cracked due to poor packaging. I decided to take the risk and I ordered two sets of drawers.  When they arrived I opened the Amazon box and noticed the cubes were tightly shrink-wrapped and there were some big air-bubble packing material surrounding them. Unfortunately, the air-packs did nothing to prevent the drawers from cracking. Both sets of drawers had small cracks in the corners on the rear of the cubes. Since the cracks would not be visible in the application I planned for them I didn't bother to return them. I figured it would be too much of a hassle to exchange them and the cracks would be hidden anyway, so I kept them. That's the only reason I removed one star from the rating for this product.The drawers are absolutely perfect for storing my cosmetics. The only problem is, if I buy more stuff I will need another set of drawers and I'm running out of space on my side of the bathroom counter! I think there might be enough space for me to buy one more set and stack it on top of the left cube and it will still give me enough clearance to open the medicine cabinet. I have a picture of my cubes and if I can figure out a way to post it with this review I will try.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: i bought a used one that was supposedly “never used” & “like brand new” but i had to use a cleaner to wash it as there were marks all over. i was left with a water stain on the drawer too so i was upset. with that being said, just spend the full price & buy a new one. it’s very cute but a little cheaply made. when i pull the drawers out, i tend to accidentally pull the whole drawer out since there is nothing to stop it. it does it’s purpose, just a few flaws.

review_text: I got this to replace a unit that had clear drawers. I am very happy with it. It arrived intact and well-packed, the knobs seem quite secure, and it looks good on my bathroom shelf. product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: This is a nicely made piece and the hardware adds just the right amount of bling/classiness to it.  I have a glass display with glass shelving where I keep the drawers and this makes the drawers appear to be made of glass as well.  I paid close attention to the dimensions listed in the description and they are accurate - I am glad because the bigger the drawer, the quicker I can clutter it so this forces me to be neat and orderly.  The drawers slide open and closed smoothly and can stay open without falling out.  And I've noticed that the material seems resistant to fingerprints.  After reading the reviews on the lipstick holders, I decided I needed another one of these just for my lipsticks and other items so I have a 2nd one on its way. Organization can be fun and look nice also.

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I plan to use these to store craft products.  They arrived in excellent shape thanks to good packaging by the manufacturer (Amazon just threw them in a too large box, but since the manufacturer had packaged them so well it didn't matter).  They are perfectly clear and the drawers slide out completely without any effort (nice for beaders since you can put the supplies close to you without things rolling around).  I have these stacked 3 high and they seem fine.  I would like a slightly better plastic as this plastic is a bit flimsy - it reminds me of the plastic tray that some chocolates come in, strong enough - but dropping it onto an uncarpeted floor might break it.  For the $20 price tag (where it is as of this writing) I think it could be a little higher quality, but the design of it is perfect.

review_title: For those who are having a hard time making the final decsion, READ ME
review_text: Yes, this is worth the investment especially if you don't have to pay a lot on shipping (even then this is worth it). I am new to the makeup world, but I jumped in on the deep end and found myself having ALOT of make up. In perspective I have approximately: four foundations, 3 primers, about 20 lip-glosses, about 20-25 lipsticks, about 20 eyes shadows ( circular individuals ), at least 15 eyeliners, 12 lip liners, 3 setting powders, 3 bronzers in various sizes and a little bit more than what I listed. I was apprehensive at first just because i am not a vetted amazon buyer or online shopper, and this all can be quite intimidating and overwhelming. But in reading the positive comments I took the plunge and I am happy I did. It came in a timely manor, was smaller than I expected but that is a deception. These puppies do hold their share of makeup. It is pretty on a vanity and looks like what a celebrity would have (not that some of you care) and over holds to what the seller claims. If you can, purchase.

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I was concerned about packaging due to so many reviews that received a broken organizer. I was lucky---mine arrived without a scratch. I will share that based on how mine was packaged, it would seem that any damage would have likely occurred prior to shipping. Compared to other drawer vanity organizers, these drawers are relatively large and deep, but small enough to fit a compact vanity. Although it is clear, there is a slight purple/blue tint to the container, but it seems to be made of durable material. I recently found several pieces of BINO brand vanity organizers at Marshalls and between the two, BINO is superior in terms of quality, but they do not offer a drawer based item. In all, I would recommend this and am pleased with my purchase.

review_text: Bought a set of four of these about a month ago, as my makeup collection was getting quite large.  They came very well packaged and I had no cracks anywhere, contrary to what some other reviewers are saying.  Yes the plastic isn't as sturdy as the more expensive drawers that you would pay over $100 for, however, I'm willing to compromise for the sake of affordability! The drawers do stack and they hold a ton of product! I have each drawer setup for particular items (ie: one for bronzers, one for highlighters, one for lipliners, etc...) They will not hold a larger palette such as the Naked palettes from UD, but that's ok with me. All in all, I would definitely recommend these! You can't beat the price and they hold much more than the Muji drawers!

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Great for Small Items, Casual Household
review_text: We are city folk, so a tiny downstairs half bathroom doubles as a laundry room. No medicine cabinet; no storage other than a cabinet under the sink. And most of the time that's okay, but when I want to put on some lipstick before leaving the house, or an overnight guest stays on the sofabed, there's nowhere to tuck little stuff away. There's also no wall space to put in a cabinet; the mirror over the sink, towel rack, and fire extinguisher pretty much eat that half of the room, and the other side is laundry shelving over the washer/dryer.I got this because it just barely fits on the sink counter, and really small stuff--lipstick, q tips, chapstick, small coins or buttons can go into the drawers. As you can see, it is transparent, which is great if you are putting in attractive things or don't care what folks see; not a great place to put your condoms or personal medications! But it's fine for us. It's lightweight, and if I knock it onto the vinyl floor even once, I suspect it will break. If a drawer is left empty, your guest can just barely stick a toothbrush and a mini toothpaste in there, but the toothbrush has to go in diagonally unless it is child sized.It would also serve well in a walk-in closet, to put extra buttons that come with clothing, safety pins, and other small notions. One small string of beads would fill a drawer. A really big string of beads would not fit.The drawers slide very smoothly, no trouble at all.For our purposes, it is dandy. Cheap, functional, and it fits in a tight space. If you are a decorator and want something that looks higher-end, this is not your box. You'll have to pay actual money. Also, I would not try to cram the drawers fuller than they are intended to be; see the dimensions advertised.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: CLOUDY!  THIS IS MADE OF CHEAP PLASTIC AND BREAKS EASILY.  THE KNOBS ARE SCRATCHED AND ARE BAD QUALITY.  THE DRAWERS ARE MADE BY MOLDING PROCESS AND THEREFORE THERE ARE MARKS ALL OVER THE INSIDE OF THE DRAWERS.  WHEN YOU PULL OUT THE DRAWERS, THEY SQUEAK AND DO NOT GLIDE OUT SMOOTHLY.  ALSO, THIS ITEM WAS SHIPPED WITHOUT BUBBLE WRAP OR ANY REASONABLE PROTECTION SO IT CAME WITH A CRACK AT THE CORNER.  I WAS DEBATING WHETHER I SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT OR THE "ICE-3D ACRYLIC" THAT IS ALSO ON AMAZON.  I BOUGHT ONE OF THESE BEFORE AND THEY ARE CRYSTAL CLEAR, AND ARE MADE OF HIGH QUALITY ACRYLIC.  NOT CHEAP PLASTIC.  ITS MADE FROM THE SAME COMPANY THAT MAKES THE 4L ACRYLIC DRAWERS SO YOU KNOW THE ACRYLIC IS HIGH QUALITY.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

review_text: I purchased 2 of these little containers & received my package this afternoon (2- days after purchasing). They came in a very nicely packed box with lots of bubble wrap so to those worried about broken items, i think they fixed that! I opened it up and the drawers are literally the perfect size to hold my every day / most worn makeup items. It's not ideal to store all of a makeup collection but it's perfect to display on your desk! :) It can fit a lot so i think it does justice to it's small size! Basically, if you want something to store your everyday/ most used makeup items on your desk & have it convenient and hold a lot, i suggest you buy these quick!!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,
