review_title: when shipped, the item had tape on it that ...
review_text: when shipped, the item had tape on it that it remained stuck to it. There was so much adhesive left behind that it ruined the appearance. Despite using soap, water, oil and magic eraser you cannot remove the adhesive and it looks ugly!!!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: 1st off let me just say how much I absolutely LOVE this product! It's more then perfect :) I was skeptical when I opened the package because how small the drawer really is but I must say that it truly does hold alot of items. I was able to fit everything from my mascara's to my naked basic palette perfectly && much more. Unfortunately, I had no problem filling all three drawers && I even put my lotions along with a few fake flowers for decoration on top. I honestly can't say one bad thing about this item && the buttons to open the drawer is definitely a plus. It's extremely convenient since the last organizer I had only had little tiny handles which made it extremely hard to open when your on a tight schedule & need to rush to just put on some mascara & blush. I can't wait to order another one so I can stack them & even thinking of getting one for my mom. The product even came a day earlier then the expected shipping date so I was extremely ecstatic about that. I give it a thumbs up && hope this review helped you make your decision that you won't regret ;)
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: This little set of drawers works great for my smallish makeup collection.  I love that it's clear, so I can easily find what I'm looking for.  The acrylic is a nice see-through quality, but apparently fragile: one drawer was already cracked right around the drawer pull/knob when I took it out of the box.  I decided not to exchange it, didn't want to pay for shipping or wait, and it's worked fine even with the crack.  It's not like I subject it to serious stress, so it's held up just fine.

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Pros: Great for Makeup Storage!!! Cons: Amazon's TERRIBLE, Damage Prone Packaging!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text: A few months ago I ordered 2 of these wanting something similar to the "K" Cube, but less expensive to store my makeup in. They arrived in perfect condition and I loved them so much that I ordered 4 more to stack into a wonderful tower of makeup goodness. Well 2 of the 4 I ordered arrived severely damaged! Huge chunks of the corners had been busted off thanks to there being nothing lining the box they were shipped in! No popcorn or air packs to buffer the impact the box would undoubtedly go through during the shipping process! This should be common sense when shipping something breakable! I'm beyond annoyed that now I have to repackage these and send them back to Amazon. I feel like Amazon should send replacements out based on the pics I uploaded showing how damaged the units are. VERY POOR CS AMAZON!!!If you're thinking about ordering these check the Container Store in your area first, you may end up pay a few dollars more, but you won't have to worry about being given damaged goods! If you're willing to take the chance with Amazon's terrible packaging, be prepared for a cracked acrylic mess on your hands when you unwrap the plastic!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: Just what I was looking for. I wanted an acrylic organizer but I didn't want it to be clear because I don't like when you can see all the stuff inside. My bathroom is very small and these fit perfectly on my counter and they are super roomy. I put double sided tape so that I could put one ontop of the other without the possibility of it sliding or moving off. They look super cute and were a great addition to my bathroom.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I was initially really afraid that they would arrive broken and fracked, but they didn't! They came in perfect condition! Now, the unit itself is nice, it's not impressive, but I love it and I'm so glad I bought it. I also purchased a liquid lipstick organizer byAllegory, and the quality of the material they use is AMAZING. It literally feels like heavy glass. But these storage drawers by InterDesign, (as I said before, they're nice), they just don't feel as nice as byAllegory products. The plastic used by InterDesign is thin and lightweight, so I can see why so many that others have ordered have arrived broken. However, overall, I do recommend, because the price is right!**Update after 6 months of use**They're still great! Easy to clean, great for storage, and I just purchased two more to stack on top of the two I already have! My makeup collection has grown! The only problem I've had with them is that the knobs come off (unsnap), and you have to snap them back on. This is easily solved with some super glue though, so I don't mind. I wish this company would come out with drawers just like this with the same outer dimensions, but just a little taller drawers for a variety of possibilities to store inside. That way you could still stack them on top of each other without one drawer set being wider or longer than the other.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: Exactly as described and they hold a lot of makeup. I'm so in love and they look so nice sitting on my makeup table with the pretty makeup packaging peeking through, (I bought the clear ones). I'm even more impressed by how much each drawer can hold, the depth and width is perfect for makeup items, haven't had any issues fitting my products. If you're buying these to hold palettes or brushes or to fit tons of makeup then don't bother. This is good for persons with a small-medium makeup collection...otherwise you'll find yourself using 3 entire drawers just to house your setting/loose powders from your collection. If you have a large makeup collection you're going to need quite a few so unless that's what you're going for or you don't mind then think about alternative storage.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: Perfect storage solution for makeup!  I have mostly mineral makeup, so lots of little jars, and these drawers are perfect for organizing them.  I put the jars on their sides so I can see the colors inside (although this does mean the jars roll around if the drawer is not completely filled).  There are no stoppers so you can pull the drawers completely out, but that's ok with me -- I used to have another brand of small plastic drawers and the stoppers made it so you couldn't even reach the last inch or so of the drawer, creating a lot of wasted space.  Plus, it's super easy to clean each drawer if you just pull it out.  The drawers have a smooth top and bottom so they can be stacked -- when I stacked two empty sets of drawers, I was afraid the top set would slide off, but once the top drawers were weighted down with makeup it felt more sturdy.  As suggested by some other reviewers, I put the SOHO Expandable Cylinder Vanity Acrylic Organizer (B008FX4NTI on top to store makeup brushes and other accessories.  The whole system looks great and is very easy to find what I'm looking for!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: LOVE. These are good quality. I like that they are very spacious. Definitely a way cheaper option than current acrylic drawers out there. They also stack nicely. I got 8 of them. I am satisfied.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I was happy I purchased this as a daily deal, so I did not pay the full $15 for this item. As other reviewers have stated, this item can often come scuffed or cracked. The packaging was spot-on, so I don't know where the scuffs originated from, but I did receive mine with some defects. I still kept it, and with makeup inside the drawers it is difficult to notice. The functionality is good; the drawers open with ease and are long enough for standard eyeliners. All in all, I'm satisfied. If you are looking for something like this in pristine condition, I'd recommend looking in stores.

review_text: LOVE THESE!!! I was looking for a better alternative to the cheap looking clear/white plastic drawers. review_text: I need to buy ten more!!! Each drawer is perfect for all make up products of all sizes. Eye shadows, lip colors, and foundations to name a few. I thought when ordering this they would be tiny, like jewelry size, but surprisingly they aren't. Only one issue one of my knobs fell off so I glued it back on. Consider a screw type pull rather then a click in one?!? Other than that I'm am so happy with this purchase. #getthem #nobuyersremorse #lovethem
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I purchased a set of 4  3-drawer units in the turquoise option. They are of a perfect size for storing my make-up products. Unfortunately, they are made of VERY THIN acrylic & several of the drawers arrived with hairline cracks in the front & side of the drawers. I did not ask for replacements due to the hassle of returns, plus I figured chances were that any units received would likely have the same problems due to the very thin acrylic. I have been able to use the drawers (gently) & they serve my purposes. However, I would NOT recommend this product due to poor quality. If they were to make a similar product using thicker acrylic at a  competitive price, I might try them again. However, since purchasing on-line does not allow for pre-determining quality, this would be a difficult decision that honestly, I think I would not risk again.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I really like these. They have loads of storage space for different makeup and jewelry items and stack nicely on top of each other. I have them stacked two high and side by side, and placed a shelf liner between the top and bottom ones to keep them from sliding. They hold more items than I believed they could, and found myself actually looking for more things to put in them.For some reference as to the size, I was able to stack two compacts with a small bit of space on top and have been able to put a smaller jewelry box inside of the drawer. So far they don't show many finger prints and have a great shine. I would recommend these products to anyone as they mix and match great together.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I bought 2 of the aqua 3 drawer organizers. It's more of a dark turquoise/teal color but it actually matches my makeup organizers better than the lighter ocean color I was expecting it to be. Mascara, sponges, palettes, you name it fit nicely in the deep drawers. This thing holds a lot! I paired it with the EasyPAG office desk metal organizer in teal for my brushes, palettes and foundations and the Closetmaid 4430 tiny 4-cube organizer for hair accessories, nail polishes, lotions etc.. it's not fancy but it's super cute!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I love these things! I had been keeping my makeup in a sterilite 5 drawer container and more often than not I opened the wrong drawers looking for specific products cause I couldn't tell what was being kept where. But with these acrylic drawers is so much easier cause I can see all my makeup without having to open the drawers. And they look adorable too. There's something about looking at makeup that makes me so happy and with these drawers I can stare at my stash all the time.They're also deep enough for perro much anything such as foundation bottles, powders, etc. Will definitely get more in the future.

review_title: They are amazing. They hold a lot more makeup then you'd ...
review_text: I got these in the 4 pack of clear. They are amazing. They hold a lot more makeup then you'd expect.  What's cool is, the more makeup you get, the more of these you can get and stack..I'm sure I'll need more in the future. I absolutely adore them and they are a lifesaver.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: Like most ladies here, I purchased these as a solution to make-up organization. Seriously gals, if you're still digging around in bags trying to find what you need every morning, LOOK NO FURTHER. These nifty organizers are about to simplify your life. I've had these for a couple of months now, and these have saved me a ridiculous amount of time since I've started using them. No more rummaging helplessly wondering where that blush went, or pulling out mystery purchases I'd forgotten about. It's all RIGHT THERE, and easy to see through the drawers. AMAZING.I bought two of these to use in tandem with the SOHO Expandable Cylinder Vanity Acrylic Organizer (I might have a bit of a make-up problem...) and let me tell you, it's like they were made for each other! The drawer organizers can stack neatly one on top of the other, or sit perfectly flush side-by-side. I opted for the later, and stacked the SOHO organizer on top---which fits perfectly!The drawers are actually quite spacious, and hold a surprising amount in each. Even most of my larger containers (i.e. Bare Minerals foundations, etc) fit nicely--although some others (Urban Decay powder foundation) are too thick to squeeze in. One drawer holds about 20 lipsticks, or 12-15 regular multi-shade eyeshadows (CoverGirl, etc.). However, full shadow palettes (i.e. Urban Decay, MAC, etc.) are typically too large.Pros: the product is sturdy, the drawers slide in/out with ease, it arrived in perfect condition, holds more than expected, and it serves it purpose better than anticipated. Overall, a fantastic buy!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Not quite what I was expecting
review_text: This set of drawers appears to be sturdy and well made. While stylish, I was expecting more of an Aqua color as pictured in the manufacturer photos.  The drawers I received look plain BLUE to me. I checked the item number on the drawers and on the box it was packaged in and both numbers match the item number provided on Amazon. Unfortunately, my office decor is AQUA and I'm disappointed that this set of drawers will not match.  In addition, the drawers came packaged with clear tape adhering to its surface, which has left a sticky residue after removal. I'm sure it can be removed using a piece of fresh Scotch tape, but it's another hit to the overall aesthetic of the product.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_title: Disappointed in the size and flimsy plastic. Won’t last too long.
review_text: I was pretty excited to get this vanity tower but not surprised that the plastic is thin, the drawers get stuck, and came with a few spots of damage. I guess it will be used only temporarily until I can find something  aesthetically nicer looking and more durable. I do have a lot of lipsticks, glosses, shadow singles, blushes and bronzers, but the drawers are just too small. Disappointed.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: Mrs. Raster says: These are nice. The pink is a bit brighter that the photos; less soft and more of that hot pink that is somewhat overdone. (And as a side note, the violet is a bit deeper/darker than pictured). I was hoping for the softer color myself, but these are still nice. I have a vintage 80's clear green one from ID that has smaller knobs, which I think was a better design element. The larger knobs are a bit goofy looking, but perhaps more functional. The metallic is also not as stylish in my opinion. My only complaint is that these are packaged with clear tape which is stuck to the bottom on both sides. The adhesive leaves a very thick sticky residue about 1" on each side which I have so far not been able to spray/rub or scrub off with baking soda scrub, so it will obviously take some other cleanser and more effort. For now I still have the residue, which if left on will attract dirt and grime. As others have said, it seems more plastic than acrylic, but the drawers function smoothly and fit Alima Pure mineral makeups (both large and small) as if they were made for them! Despite my personal preferences, I am still very happy with this product though I do think it's a bit overpriced for what it is. I did buy this primarily for looks as well as function so it is what it is.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: This is a well made and nice looking product. The shipping was fast (it came a day earlier than expected), and the packaging was extensive and nicely protected from any cracks. I was concerned about that after reading some other reviews with packaging issues. I've already used this product to organize my desk and it's made things so much more convenient. What I also liked about this storage organizer (when compared to others I searched for on amazon), is that it has a smooth and sleek design - no major cuts or indentations that gather dust and make it difficult to wipe clean. I love how I can see everything, it's organized, and completely free of dust collection on the items inside! I also applaud the look of this product; the "chrome" knobs make it look more special than your average storage organizer.The only reason I am giving this a 4/5 instead of a 5/5 is that with the cost of the product, tax, and ~$8 standard shipping, it was quite pricey for its size.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I originally purchased two of these to store my makeup.  Previously I had been using several makeup bags (you know, the kind you get free with promotional purchases at department stores/beauty stores), keeping some in a drawer in the bathroom, and some in the bathroom linen closet.  Having everything spread out like that made getting ready a hassle, especially since my house has only one bathroom and my boyfriend and I are always battling over it in the morning as we get ready for work.  If he needed to get in there, I'd have to grab numerous makeup bags and dash out hoping that I grabbed everything I needed (which I never seemed to).  Further, I would often forget about some of the really cool makeup I'd purchased (out of sight, out of mind). When I first ordered these, my boyfriend thought they were a waste of money, and he didn't want them cluttering up the vanity.  But this morning when he kicked me out of the bathroom and all I had to do was pick up the one set of drawers to continue getting ready in the bedroom, he admitted that it was really convenient.  :)  Despite their relatively small size, these drawers actually hold a lot of makeup, plus they look really attractive.  As my makeup collection has grown, so has my collection of these drawers.  They stack easily on top of and next to each other.  I shopped around for similar acrylic organizers and these were the best value I've found.  My mom really liked the look of mine, so I've bought 3 for her as well.  Definitely recommend!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I purchased these drawers to store all my cosmetics and skin care items in and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. They are pink but a more see through coloring which makes it a lot easier for me to find items I need faster. These drawers are not huge but are large enough to fit things like tubes of creams, foundations, etc. A secret clinical deodorant laying on its side is about the height of one drawer. I love that they can either be stacked or left side by side and fit perfectly either way I choose. They are made sturdy and the drawers also can be pulled out completely which is nice for cleaning or just searching for things. I will most definitely be buying more of these in the future when it comes time for more storage. As of now I have four.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I bought these fabulous storage drawers in the set of 4 and could not be happier.  They are EXACTLY what I was hoping for.  I recently bought a ton of makeup and needed a way to store and organize it.  My first attempt was a wooden 3 drawer unit which was very disappointing.  I knew I had seen something similar to these in a "beauty guru" You Tube video and I can confirm that these little beauties are exactly what you makeup-buying gals (or guys) are looking for.These drawer sets are made of very sturdy acrylic.  They are very well constructed and are extremely durable.  I purchased them in clear, but even if you purchase the colored acrylic sets, you will still be able to see inside the drawers for easy identification.  The drawers open and close very easily with a nice smooth movement.  No massive tugging or awkward juggling necessary.Most importantly, the drawers hold WAY more than you would expect!  Any of you familiar with the E.L.F. brand of makeup and how they ship their products in large plastic drawstring bags?  Well, I had FOUR of those bags filled to the brim as well as two small cardboard boxes filled with assorted makeup (didn't I mention that I had bought a TON of makeup? LOL).  Well, ALL of that makeup fit into these four units and I even have one empty drawer to spare!As my daughter was helping me load the drawers and sort the products, my first thought was that I would need to buy another four pack.  Not needed!  It is so refreshing to buy something and not only have it meet your expectations, but actually exceed your expectations.  Definitely highly recommend!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
variation: Color: Slate GrayStyle Name: Set of 1
review_text: When it arrived it wad in great condition. No cracks or anything like that. I like the size. I use it for my every day makeup, eye shadows, and eyeliners. I only have about 8 eye shadows of varying sizes (some bigger since they are quads and some smaller ones). That fits great with room to space. I also like the varying colors. I didn't want a clear one because like they look cheap so i got a mint one. It makes it looks more expensive than it is. The drawers slide in and out easily and you are able to fully take out the drawer. I'm planning to buy another one for like pencils and pens and post it notes and stuff like that.
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I love these storage bins.  These are small and stackable and held so much more makeup than I thought it could.  I bought 4 of them and was able to put a ton of lipsticks, blushes, eye shadows, highlighters, mascara and other tubes of makeup.  They came packaged fine so I didn't have any cracks as some other reviews stated they did when they unboxed the product.  I have these stacked on a cube dresser in my closet and they don't take up much room.  I highly recommend if you are trying to organize your makeup and not spend a ton of money doing it
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I bought 4 of these a couple of years ago.  They have held up and done the job just fine.  Used for makeup (of course) and they held a significant amount. (I don't have much storage space at the moment so I keep all my makeup on top of my makeup-table).  The only complaint I had was the silver knobs.  I would have preferred them to be clear, but it wasn't something that bothered me.  I had 4 and stacked them in pairs side-by-side.  I would suggest using rubber grips on the bottom if you plan on stacking them because they do slide.  I purchased new organizers just for personal preference, but gave two of these to my sisters.  They love them for makeup storage.  They are also great for jewelry.My only suggestion would be to order the 4drawer package deal they have instead of 4 separate ones depending on the price at time of purchase. (I bought them when they were around $12, the price increases/decreases all the time).
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I ordered 2 of the light grey bins after I had just remodeled my bathroom to blend in with the new paint color. I had clear acrylic bins previously but I wanted something that would hide the clutter of my makeup and a few other things. The cube measures 6.5" x 6.5" x 6.5." My makeup and belongings fit great with room to spare! The only con is that they slide around when they're stacked and the bottoms are not exactly flat. (That's being picky). I would recommend these. They would be great for art supplies too.

review_text: I love these! At first I wasn't sure if they would be big enough... Turns out they are perfect for my needs! Originally, I had my eye on something larger. But then, it went out of stock :( So, I bought these instead based on the reviews. The photos the reviewers added to their reviews really helped me make my decision. I bought 4 thinking I wouldn't need them all & I could give one to my mom & one to my little sis. Turns out my makeup collection was slightly larger than I originally thought! I'm definitely going to buy some more for them though! They could have been a little deeper so I could have stacked some things vertically, but over all I am very happy with my purchase! They were all packaged individually then packed snugly together & shipped in the same box. So, they all arrived without cracks or anything :)

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I love these! The depth of the drawers (2 inches), perfect! I got the set of 4 in clear. Stacked two by two. Because these have depth you can stack inside. All of my Estee Lauder products, in one drawer. My MAC products, one drawer. My skin is changing so I have different foundations and bb/cc creams, etc. I am currently in love with Clinique Even Better foundation, so I went to Macy's and got Even Better and Stay Matte, just to see which I like best, I ended up keeping both. When I got the foundations there was a freebee bag of Clinique goodies because I spent $40 (night cream, moisturizer, eye shadow/blush palette, mascara, perfume, lipstick), and everything fits in one drawer nice and neat with room for more stuff. I have a drawer for my Smashbox products, etc. Keeps my vanity top neat. I took my wall mirror down to put these up to see how high, etc, will reposition my mirror because these are pretty tall, but so happy I have lots of space for more stuff ;o) My Sleek palettes fit in one drawer ... nice and sturdy, stacks nicely, the clear has a blue tint, but can still see through the drawers.

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry

review_text: I bought about four of these for my makeup desk and I love them. They're small enough so they don't take over too much room on my desk and they hold a good amount of makeup. review_text: Nice but does not last, I have had these organizers about 2 years and I am already replacing them with I different set because the metal handles fall off over time. I have tried re appplying them and even super glue. If you don’t need heavy duty storage these are great.

review_text: I bought two of these to organize my makeup in. Before I bought these, all of my makeup was just thrown in a big drawer, unorganized. I would have to dig through to find what I needed and I hated it. I had been looking for a good quality, sturdy, makeup organizer for a while that was also inexpensive and found nothing.This is totally worth the money. Its completely sturdy and the drawers are roomier than I thought. Two of these organizers fill all my makeup perfectly. It fits everything except things like powder brushes because those are obviously too big.I was more impressed with these than I thought I would be.They are not cheap whatsoever. The knobs on the drawers are sturdy too. You can stack them, when I put one on top of the other, they don't slide. I have them side by side though because I have cats, they knock everything down.Overall, great product for the money, exactly what I was looking for. Thoroughly impressed.

review_text: This is not the biggest nicest acrylic out there, but they work really well for me. I would be really surprised if they broke as long as you aren't being crazy rough with them. review_text: I bought one of these in Target about 8 years ago and went back to get another about 4 years ago. Target no longer carried it , so I settled for a smaller one . For myself,  I took the middle drawer out and set it on top, so the bottom drawer would hold taller items. The company could very easily make a deeper drawer  by putting 2 knobs on it , so it matches their original design.  These  drawers  don't  fall in, or collect dust .

review_text: I saw this at The Container Store but the one that was left was beaten up, so I ordered it here because their website was out of stock.  It's perfect for makeup. This picture is deceiving as it looks smaller than it really is.  They should show it loaded up with makeup.  I'm actually sorry that I didn't get more.  Instead, I spent a small fortune on a clear modular system that The Container Store carries on their website.  While that set is much larger, it doesn't have knobs like this one. review_title: The best thing ever for my make-up!!
review_text: I started by ordering two of these, as I seen a picture on here and I thought that two would look good as I could either stack them or place them side by side.  However, now that the two I have has totally organized my eye shadows, foundations, concealers, blushes, and lipsticks/glosses, I need to order another two for all my other miscellaneous items to make my make-up area look totally organized.  These drawers are very sturdy and I like the fact that they are clear so I can easily see what I'm looking for.  No complaints from me!

product_title: InterDesign 3-Drawer Storage Organizer for Cosmetics, Makeup, Beauty Products or Kitchen/ Office Supplies, Berry
review_text: I use this to store my MAC (all sizes), NYX, HIP and other pigments.  It worked out well.  One thing I did have an issue with was how rough the drawers themselves are when opening and closing the draws.  If my pigment touch the edges of the drawer it become stuck.  To combat this, I allow a little wiggle room on all for walls.This has also been great for storing my paint pots, jumbo pencils, and paints. The surface is very smooth so if you plan to stack these, I recommend using glue dots or something similar.

review_title: Perfect Makeup Storage For A Budget
review_text: Like a lot of ladies here, I purchased these for makeup storage. I spent a while looking at these acrylic cubes and was not about to shell out $100+ on them! I'd rather spend that on makeup! I'm extremely happy with my purchase; as soon as they arrived (I bought two), I ran into my bathroom and started organizing. My bathroom counter space was very limited, and it was an huge train wreck with my growing collection of makeup. I previously had makeup stored in 3 non matching baskets on my counter and it was just so ugly, disorganized and impossible to find things quickly. Which lead to me not using so much of my makeup because I didn't want to look for it ! Now I have regained my counter, everything has it's place.I have a drawer for blush, foundations/concealer/powders, small eyeshadow palettes/singles, eyeliner/mascara/brow pencils, lip products, and a misc. drawer with a few sponges & tools.These are not TOO big, and I was worried my collection wouldn't fit when I saw them, but everything just fit and I have a little room to spare. Someone with a large collection might want to purchase 3-4 of these. 4 would stack nicely (2x2)! The drawers themself are a decent size, and will fit most products okay, although you will have to lay them on their side. For a size reference, the drawers are almost exactly the same height as a Revlon Colorstay Whipped foundation. I have uploaded a few photos!My cubes came wrapped in those huge bubble wraps and a mini bubble wrap and paper, sealed in plastic, even so one of the cubes has a split/crack above the handle, which I think was a defect, and did not happen during the shipping. It's hard to notice when everything is inside and does not effect the product at all, so I am okay with it.I also ordered a soho expandable organizer to sit ontop of the two cubes, to hold brushes and most-used pencils, and it's a PERFECT fit - highly recommended to pair the two up!!
category: Home & Kitchen, Bath, Bathroom Accessories, Makeup Organizers,

Nope, just got the replacement and yet again it is all scratched up. I am sorry, but for $20 I am looking for a product that arrives undamaged. These marks are not small, they cover the top of the case as well as the entire front of the middle drawer and they don't wipe off or clean up. They are etched into the finish. Very disappointed.

review_title: A MUST-HAVE for the makeup connoisseur
review_text: I bought two of these, one for makeup and one for hair ties, bobby pins and headbands.I was skeptical that my makeup would fit in one, but was shocked to find that it did! And believe me, I have a ton. I fit 20 tubes of lipstick in one drawer with plenty of room for more. :)My only complaint is that the drawers aren't big enough to store makeup brushes. I would buy another one in a second if they fit. Also, eyeshadow palettes don't fit, but I wouldn't have expected them to.It looks so much better than my old makeup bag that I had laying on my counter. I keep much more organized now. Counter space for the win!For the price, it can't be beat!

So, overall:Pros:-good size: perfect as go-to makeup drawers (dont exect to fit ALL your makeup but rather your daily goto ones)-nice design: you get what you see. it looks really cute on my vanity. and i can see everything in it!-cheap: i searched multiple sites with multiple key words. trust me, this is as cheap as it gets for acrylic drawers of decent sizecons:-quality of acrylic: as mentioned above, its decent quality but it is definitely plasticky and a bit flimsy. would prefer something thicker and more glass-like acrylic.Overall, i do recommend this drawer :)They should make this in more sizes!!

review_title: Mine is more than 10 years old!
review_text: Yes, I've had one of these for more than ten years.  I got it in a store on the East Coast and took it with me when I moved west.  I use it for little office supplies.  I have a table-style desk with no drawers.  This keeps all my paper clips, note pads, binder clips, staple remover, extra staples and tape, big erasers, etc., etc., contained and easy to find.  No wondering if I have what I need.  I have my stapler and tape dispenser on top and my pens and pencils in cups next to it.  This gets daily use and has no cracks or chips after all this time, even with moving it, fully loaded, in a van with my furniture.  Highly recommended no matter what you want to put in it.  To me, being able to see the contents is key.

review_title: Very well made but prone the ocassional scratch in the paint

I did notice despite all of the care taking in the packing I had three little scratches on the side of one cat. If you're someone who likes things perfect that might be an issue with this item for you. I happen to think it gives it character as if my second cat bookend got into little scuffle before being shipped.

review_title: I was hoping to get the grey grinning Totoro like the one that is pictured
review_text: This is incredibly small. It is just 6.25 inches tall, that's including the little mini totoro on top. Without the ears and mini totoro, it stands 5.5 inches. The diameter at the base is 3 inches. The head twists open to reveal a metal cavity for drinks, but honestly, I would probably store some candies inside. Also, I was hoping to get the grey grinning Totoro like the one that is pictured, but I got a grey one with a non-smiling face like the blue one. In general, it is well made, with a silicone-like grippy texture. Ultimately, I think my friend will like her gift, but it's not exactly what I had expected.

product_title: Calico Cat Paw 9 Oz. Mug
review_title: Very cute but actually much smaller.
review_text: It's very nice but the photo size is a bit deceptive and makes it look much bigger than the mug actually is. This isn't a regular sized coffee mug as those of us in the US think of one. It's more like a child sized mug. And the product description makes no mention this is actually an imported item from Japan. Which is fine but for one thing- the care instructions on the box are in Japanese so while the Amazon description says it's dishwasher safe, there's no way to tell by the box unless you happen to know Japanese! And I suspect the mug actually isn't completely dishwasher safe after all because the pink paw pads are handpainted on, which is usually what indicates it should be handwashed. Whether its actually microwave safe is anybody's guess too.So cute but too small, directions in Japanese, and dubious wash/mircowave safe claims.

product_title: Mansalee Cute Stealing Money Box Panda Bank Money Bank Piggy Bank Coin Bank (Panda)
review_title: Fun little toy with no other value than entertaining!
review_text: Love it! I bought this just as a fun gift for myself. My kids love it (and they're teens!). My dog is puzzled by it - making for hours of viewing entertainment. My cats are extremely suspicious of it, which is as entertaining as the dog's reaction. The ONLY reason I have to give four stars is that it's loud. My kids say that my hearing is too sensitive, but I had to tape some tissue over the speaker box to mute it a bit. Oh, and it doesn't just meow. It says something absolutely unintelligible, then meows. Still lots of fun and my teens are rescuing pennies now to put in the machine. Best part is that when it's full .. we will go out for ice cream.
category: Baby Products, Gifts, Toy Banks,

product_title: Mansalee Cute Stealing Money Box Panda Bank Money Bank Piggy Bank Coin Bank (Panda)
review_text: My 2-year old daughter loves this thing. I love leaving change around for her to find just so she can feed the doggy.I’ve been trying to convince her to not pick it up but every now and then she will try.  That is where some of my issues begin. It doesn’t take much effort to discount the front paws from the bank part.  Thankful, it’s easy enough to reconnect.That machine is also much smaller than I had expected.  It is the length of a dollar bill.  It’s not a major issue but for some reason after watching some YouTube videos, I just assumed a bigger bank.Also, don’t drop it. My little girl dropped it from about 2 feet and the latch in the front easily popped open. I now have a strap of packaging tape over it to help in case it happens again.Overall, I do like it because my little girl loves it.
category: Baby Products, Gifts, Toy Banks,

I bought, for my grandsons, a monkey, and a couple of pandas from different companies.  They seem to be the same except for the distributor and price.  However, only the monkey actually says "thank you" in English.  The other animals make a kind of meowing sound and then an unintelligible kind of thank you.  But they're all really cute.  Don't know how long they'll last, but if the children  don't manage to pull the animals out of the box, they should be around a while.

review_text: I know there have been concerns about whether or not you're getting the Panda, and I did in fact get it. It talks and makes noise as it steals your coins. I'm pretty sure it's saying "xie xie" or "Thanks". Seems to be of very good quality. product_title: Mansalee Cute Stealing Money Box Panda Bank Money Bank Piggy Bank Coin Bank (Panda)
review_text: This toy is great! I ordered one and it came 4 days EARLY! It works just like it claims, all of the bad reviews are baffling! Like one, that gave it one star because "It wasn't a good cat toy" IT IS NOT A CAT TOY! IT IS A BANK!!! Anyway, it is so cute! It is MORE adorable than the picture. My cat does love it, even though I bought it as a bank. I VERY much suggest this as something to buy, though, I would get THIS brand, it didn't get many bad reviews. The only bad thing is that if you tilt it or put TOO many coins in, the paw gets a little bit stuck, but it is easy to fix. Just wiggle the box around. The box is made of really good plastic, and is very durable. The cat is made of strong plastic as well, but it is covered in a tiny bit of felt. I suggest this item.
category: Baby Products, Gifts, Toy Banks,

review_title: this is a great gift for anyone and provides entertainment
review_text: Very cute and entertaining for my young son, but has some faults to warrant three stars.  First, it's very loud.  It detracts from the "cuteness" to hear the loud whirring and whining of the motor when the arm moves.  Second, no clue what the thing says when you press the button, and you can't disable it (without cutting wires).  It's loud, distorted, and at least to me, unintelligible.  Third, it doesn't always successfully grab the coin.  We found we have to keep the coin right on the edge to maximize success, but if you center the coin, it's probably 75% successful.  However, for the price, this is a great gift for anyone and provides entertainment.

review_title: Well, it does what u expect...LIGHT UP
review_text: Firstly, I got this item at a discount.Now this was a little surprising, off the rip, I thought man..this things a little small. I really thought this light was going to be more beefy. Gave it a once over, saw It has no "modes" switches or anything like that, I was like damn...where the controls?? So its simple, you plug it in and it goes. I read on the box that it has a feature called "intelligent voice" so I'll have to look into that. On the bottom of it had a little valley/groove for the cord which is awesome, but I didn't see any ridges or anything like that to keep it in there so I used tape. It spins continuously which what I hope for my last one just went left and right. I wish there was a remote or something to freeze the colors or change the speed, have a blue light moving slow around the room while DJing that would be dope. The cord is kinda short, so if you decide to hang it off the wall, you might wanna get an extension cable for it. Its light so no worry about stripping screws out of the wall. It does have a hum to it...but after a while you wont notice it, specially if music is playing. If you live in a different country like me, make sure its 110 your plugging into as this isn't dual voltage.This puts on a decent little show, its just.......small, lol.

product_title: Mansalee Cute Stealing Money Box Panda Bank Money Bank Piggy Bank Coin Bank (Panda)
review_text: My biggest issue with this Mansa Mini Rotating Magic Ball Light is the fact that it has a super short cord. The plug cord must be about two and a half feet long so you most likely will have to use an extension cord when using this. The other thing I don't like about this product is the fact that it doesn't have an on-off switch (or any switches for that matter) which would have been nice. It is made of semi durable plastic and it is LED so I expect the lights to last quite a while. For the price you pay you're really getting a bargain, and it puts out a lot of lights and they're very beautiful colors. It really lights up a room so you could have people dancing and not actually need to have any lights on, or even use it for a nice nightlight. My daughter wants to have this in her room as her nightlight but I'm going to have to use an extension cord just to get it to sit on her desk because the outlet is so low to the floor and the cord is so short. The pictures in the ad makes it look like you can do different colors if you wish, but you can only use all the colors at once which is red blue and green. They are very bright and very beautiful. It does have two holes on the back so that you can attach it to screws on the wall and mounted. I definitely love this product more if the cord was longer but for the price that you pay it's definitely worth every penny. I got this product at a discounted rate.Thanx <3
category: Baby Products, Gifts, Toy Banks,

review_text: This lost a star strictly for lack of an on/off switch.  My little boy loves music and karaoke in our living room. Another family has some similar lights so I looked into buying one for our living room. The opportunity arose to receive a discount in exchange for an unbiased review. So I took it. This is perfect for a large living room or dining room. Most likely it would work fone in a dance studio, bar or nanquet hall. The led lights are bright and flash excitedly. My son thinks this is just the greatest. I would appreciate the ability to slow the lights or just have them dance at a lower speeds. Since there is no switch I had to ensure my son doesn't try to plug in to the wall or power strip. It is just a little inconvenient that's all.

product_title: Set of 6 Cute Kawaii Novelty Cartoon Colored Assorted Animals Double Tips Highlighters Pens Fluorescent Ink Markers 6 Different Colors Set For Books
review_text: These are adorableIt comes in two types; one is a highlighter thick ink and the other is thin for writingI ordered in December 12 and received them December 28 when it said it wouldn't ship till January 25 I was sad but haha it came way earlierThe only downside is they're a bit difficult to open besides that they're really cute and nice
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Writing & Correction Supplies, Markers & Highlighters, Highlighters,

product_title: Set of 6 Cute Kawaii Novelty Cartoon Colored Assorted Animals Double Tips Highlighters Pens Fluorescent Ink Markers 6 Different Colors Set For Books
review_title: vibrant and true to ship dates
review_text: I got these highlighters to use for school since the colors looked so vibrant and pastel shaded. Shipping was true to the dates listed and I got my order 3 weeks after ordering it. The colors are slightly less pastel than pictures but are still nice and vibrant. I like the two sided feature so you have both a thin and thick width highlighter for each color. I have been using them constantly for 3 months now and they stilk work just as well as new.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Writing & Correction Supplies, Markers & Highlighters, Highlighters,

product_title: Set of 6 Cute Kawaii Novelty Cartoon Colored Assorted Animals Double Tips Highlighters Pens Fluorescent Ink Markers 6 Different Colors Set For Books
review_text: These are really cute, and really BRIGHT. Very saturated color. I like that they are dual tipped with the chisel at one end and fine point at the other. Arrived faster than expected. Would have given 5 stars, but they tend to drag gel and marker type inks. Ballpoint and Sharpies seem to highlight just fine.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Writing & Correction Supplies, Markers & Highlighters, Highlighters,

product_title: Set of 6 Cute Kawaii Novelty Cartoon Colored Assorted Animals Double Tips Highlighters Pens Fluorescent Ink Markers 6 Different Colors Set For Books
review_text: I ordered these pens because the highlighters themselves looked adorable and there were 6 for only five dollars. It took 17 days for the highlighters to arrive at my doorstep. I'd say for the most part, these highlighters are worth it for the price. The little animals are very cutely drawn and the two sides are helpful. The ink is not so watery that it bleeds through regular copy paper. The plastic is not high quality stuff, but I do not mind because the price was low.My complaints:While the ink may not bleed, the highlighters have a "dry" feeling to them. The ink does not flow as well as I'd like it to for a highlighter. Also, I am afraid that the "dryness" signals that the ink will run out quickly. Some of what I highlighted have patchy spots where the ink did not really mark the paper.In the pictures displayed on Amazon, the colors the highlighters produce seem more pastel, however these highlighters are NOT pastel. The outside plastic also suggests pastel coloring, but the actual colors of the highlighters are standard, bright highlighter colors. (I have included a picture)The cap on the thin end of my pink highlighter was very loose compared to the other ones and the cap does not "click" onto the pen. Instead it sort of slides on and stays there. This can be a problem because slight movements of my pencil case could pop off the cap and ruin the marker and my cloth pencil bag. This is a shame because my pink highlighter was the only one that flowed nicely but still did not bleed through paper.Other than my small complaints, the highlighters satisfied me.

review_text: EH. I was super excited to get this, so I was a tad disappointed. The magnetic arm is pretty strong (I put metal nail files on it) but it's only magnetic on one side, limiting how much you can put on there. I am mostly disappointed in the shoddy paint job, which has large paint drips on the side of the opening :(
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_text: I love this cactus pen holder cup. It holds pens, is magnetic, and is super cute. My only criticisms are that it is a bit small, some top heavy pens I have may cause it to topple. Also it's more lime green than I anticipated. But I'm happy with it.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_title: Perfect complement to cactus themed dorm room
review_text: Purchased for my daughter to take to college because she's into cactus and succulents.  Small, as other reviews stated, but so cute and unique.  It's a little on the small side; I don't know that it is sturdy enough to accommodate a lot of heavy pens or pencils, but great for a couple of highlighters, rubber bands and a home for stray paper clips.  Really more of a novelty to complete a desk/room theme, but still, a reasonably priced purchase.  Fits right in with the cactus pens, erasers, pencil sharpener, note pad, . . . you get the picture.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_text: Only one of the arms is a magnet. It's a shame because the description clearly reads saying to utilize the magnetic "branches". My girlfriend was really excited about this but it turned out to be disappointing. :(If that's fine with you, it's alright, but we ended up returning it.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_title: Very cute, but not stable and different product quality from different sellers.
review_text: So I ordered two of these, each from different sellers (that's another story), and one is way better than the other. So I'm not sure if one seller is making a knock-off product? But one stands way better than the other, and one is slightly a lighter green. Either way, they tip over easily. Other people complained about only one of the arms being magnetic, and I do think that makes it tip over easily. My brother (who I gifted them to) has now glued coasters to the bottom of them to keep them standing.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_text: Unfortunately neither one of my branches were magnetic. Really disappointed as besides my obsession with cactuses its multipurpose was why I purchased it. Must’ve gotten the knock off one. Still cute.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_text: The picture  is  a little misleading  for the reason it is much smaller  in person  but able to hold most of my pens. Very  vibrant  color and adds some personality to my desk ! Its a good buy but dont expect  to put alot of things in this holder. I even  purchased  cactus ink  pens to match☺☺ My co workers  are asking where  did i purchase  this
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_text: Exceptionally shallow, but also super cute.  Like this can barely hold a pen deep enough that it doesn’t fall out if the pen is slightly larger than an average BIC. And if anything with some weights put in, it will topple. That being said. I bought it cause of the cactus shape, but it’s almost unusable.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

review_title: I love it, and love the design but itʻs actually ...

category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Mustard Pen Holder Desktop Organiser - Green Cactus
review_text: This product took over 3 weeks to arrive, and when it finally did it was broken, and it seemed like it didn’t have the magnet capacity it promises. I even tried the small size paper clips, and they would not hold - slipped right off as if there were no magnet. It’s chte looking but the product I received did no have magnet capacity which was a big reason why I ordered it in the first place. I can blame the seller for it arriving broken as I know sometimes accidents happen in transition but was disappointed it wouldn’t hold my paper clips and other metal office supplies.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Desk Supplies Holders & Dispensers, Pencil Holders,

product_title: Sloth Daily Planner and Note Pad
review_text: I got this note pad as a gift for my sloth crazed friend. Usually anything sloth themed is a hit with her, but this note sheet was an absolute win. She loved it.First of all, the sheets are cute as heck. There is a place to rate your sloth mood, every header is a pun, and the design is tasteful. Second, it is organized in a way that makes sense. It separates errands from short tasks and more. Third, the paper is quality.If you are on the fence, this product is perfect.

product_title: Sloth Daily Planner and Note Pad
review_text: I, like many of you here, have a sloth-obsessed friend who I knew would love this gift. She had a wonderful reaction to it and really loved all the little details of this to-do list. It is a good size (a little smaller, but not by too much in comparison to a piece of standard notebook paper) and the paper is of a good thickness. I would highly recommend this product for the price!

product_title: Sloth Daily Planner and Note Pad

product_title: Cute Rabbit and Radish Press Shape Gel Ink Pens Novelty Animal Writing Pens 4 Pack
review_text: I bought this to tally my laps when running on a small indoor track this winter, and it was a great purchase. It's larger than I expected, but that actually means that I can hold it comfortably while running-- no need to clench my hand, especially as it has a metal loop that goes over your finger to help secure it. It's easy to click while moving so I can tally laps as I go, and the numbers stay accurate (no accidental laps or impact from being shaken). Very helpful if you'd rather think of something other than "What lap is this again?" while running a track.

product_title: 360 Cute Cat Sticky Notes Page Flags Index Tabs for Cat Lovers Kids Office School Reading
review_text: Stickiness dearth is problematic for grabbing the cat face directly to turn the page.  For maximum cuteness I have only half the cat face visible beyond the edge of the page.  But any length of cat flag is a less than satisfying flip. I am tempted to 'fix' these with 3M repositionable adhesive sprayThe Good:🐱 delectary visages🐱 warms the heart to see while flipping to notebook sections🐱 more reasonable price now than in JuneCat Cons:😾 less than 25% of the paper flag is sticky😾 not even close to the stickiness of 3M post-it flags😾 closer to the stickiness of  3M post-it [paper] page markers, but weaker😾 NOT tabs.  These are very thin flagsThis cat purchase was a near toss-up between the SIQUK polka dot TABS.  I do realize this would be an unfair comparison (tabs vs flags), but that's not my intent.  I did not yet need more tabs.  I wanted some flag variation amongst the simply colored PET plastic.Buy again for fewer than 4 monies? Doctor them with repositionable spray, and restack for use.  I would not use these again as-is.NOT as descibed (returned):- Sticky Notes- Index Tabs-- update  2018 October 16 --SIQUK makes zero tabs.  I ordered tabs but received flags which nonetheless are more usable than these cat flags.-- update 2019 January 8 --These are so NOT sticky the "stickers" fall off the second sheet by touching them.  Changed from 3 stars to 1.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Book Covers & Book Accessories, Bookmarks,

If you like to write things on your sticky bookmarks, these might not be the best for you, but for marking pages and putting a smile on your face, these cute cat sticky notes are just the thing.  I need to order again, because my daughter and my granddaughter have taken some of them to use, too!

review_text: I love cats and was in need for Post Its, so this seemed like an ideal combo for me. The post its are much smaller than I expected, and they're not as vivid in color as the photos, but I was able to look beyond that given how incredibly adorable they are. They make me smile :) I was pleased to find that there were a total of 3 packages of these cat post its, so that was a plus. However, the only down side is they don't stick very well. They definitely need to have more adhesive. If you're looking for Post its to write on, these may not be for you as they are small in size, but I find them ideal for marking pages in books (rather than creasing the corners of pages in books) Overall, I'm quite happy with buying these cute cat post its and most likely will buy more of them when need be...

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: This thing is awesome for my purposes.  The wrist pad is soft and squishy and the mouse pad is firm and really grippy on the bottom, so it won't slide around or slide off an un-level surface (within reason, I'm sure).  The pattern is very vivid and looks very nice.  With modern dpi-adjustable laser mice, it's more than large enough at roughly 8" square without being too big.  Mine was also odor-neutral; I see some reviews that complain about a bad smell that I haven't experienced.  It seems put together well enough after using it now for not quite a month on a daily basis.  No telling how it will wear over time, but at the price I paid I won't cry if it falls apart.  I'll probably pick up one more for work.I tried to think of something negative to say to balance the review, but honestly it's just been a good buy.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: I like it. The wrist foam area is very nice and supportive. It comes with a protective film on the underside, which is nice. The underside is kind of tacky but not adhesive, this is nice, too - won't move around during use. It's just as pictured. There is an odor that is noticeable upon opening the package and there is a note included with the product to advise of this and to let it air out for a few days. It does slightly concern me because I'm curious as to why the odor is present and if there is a health concern related to the products causing the odor. However, the odor does dissipate quickly; I left it out to air overnight and the smell was already greatly reduced. Overall, good purchase.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_title: Ok if you like a harder wrist support
review_text: The colors were not quite as vivid as the picture, the bright blues especially were just not there, but it was still pretty.  The shape of the pad was great to sit on my mouse shelf and kept the wrist pad in the correct position, but the wrist rest was so hard!  After fie minutes of resting my hand on it, my wrist had more pain than not using the support at all.  I switched over to a thin pillow with memory foam and it was so much nicer.  My wrist sinks in, but still isn't bent.  I think this is great if you need something to just hold your wrist up while using the mouse, but if you need more 'cushion' or something with some 'give' to it, this won't work well.

review_text: I had to get used to mouse pad after looking at it at first. It felt a little light compared to ones I used in the past. I also had to get used to the wrist area, which is smaller than ones I used to use. The color is very nice and it comes with a clear plastic covering on bottom to protect it during shipping. product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: It just arrived, and I put it into immediate use.  I chose the design called Blue Flower, and it's beautiful. Very well made and sturdy, a lovely smooth texture to the fabric and the mouse moves perfectly on it.  It is tacky on the bottom, so it clings to the desk nicely. I have it jutting a bit off the front edge of the desk, and the tackiness as well as the thickness of the wrist part allow for it not to move around or to bend there. Some reviewers have said theirs smell; mine doesn't smell at all. I bought this to replace a very similar one that was looking a bit grimy after 5 years, and which I had loved. This new one's gel pad is somewhat firmer than my old one.  I preferred the old softer one (a different manufacturer), so that is the only thing that caused me to drop one star from my rating.  Still, this gel pad definitely is protection for my wrist from the edge of the desk, so its purpose is served.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

review_text: This is a good mouse pad, the wrist support is very firm but the design is so cool. Does hurt the palm of my hand a little bit but have a bead wrist protector that softens this product. Like the design.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: This mouse pad is like Gandalf the White!  I didn't really believe that it would make a difference in my work environment and thought it might even feel painful or weird.  Boy was I high when I thought that!  It has alleviated a lot of my wrist pain and I find myself resting my hand on it even when I'm not using my mouth.  It has straightened out the alignment of my hand and I'm no longer lowering my wrist while working with my mouse.  I can absolutely tell the difference if I'm on my normal mouse pad @ home; it's good (Gandalf the Grey) but it ain't great.  I need to buy another one for my home office and for my mom.  If you're hesitating, don't.  You will be punching yourself in the face that you didn't buy it sooner (don't actually do that; it would be stupid).  Buy it and your wrist will thank you.

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: I purchased this mouse pad with wrist rest at the end of July 2018 and by September it had already lost its functionality as the gel contained within the wrist rest started to ooze out the side and all over my computer desk. When I first noticed it I attempted to stem the gel flow by duct taping the opening on the side where it had burst through, however, it just moved the problem elsewhere. I now have duct taped the entire thing just to preserve what gel is left in the wrist support but there just is not enough left in there and it is very uncomfortable to use. This pad was purchased for my home computer that I typically spend about 3 hours a day on. I have the Amazon branded pad with wrist rest that I purchased over a year ago on my machine at work and it is still going strong with 8 hours a day use with no deformations or malfunctions. I am very disappointed in the build quality of such a simple device. It looks good but has very poor performance after very limited use.

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: 2017/11/30  --  A pink mouse pad with gel wrist support isn’t easy to find, so this gets a couple stars just for being pink. Also, as I mentioned, it’s GEL, not memory foam, as the product description claims. A couple other reviewers mentioned that as well. It feels good and seems to be average sized.It does have a rather offensive chemical odor coming from it that I hope will dissipate soon. If it doesn’t, I’ll be back to knock some stars off.The back is a glossy, black material that prevents the pad from sliding around. I’m guessing if it gets dirty though, it will lose it’s tackiness.For size comparison, I photographed this mouse pad between a very old Belkin mouse pad with gel wrist support and a standard flat mouse pad. There are also photos with a standard-sized and compact-sized laptop mouse on top of the pad. Then there’s a pic of the front & back of it. The last two images show some creases in the fabric, but I don’t expect those to cause a problem. If I stop using it, it will be because of the odor. It seems to be coming from the back of the mouse pad. I wish they had just used rubber.2017/12/29  --  It's been a month and this mouse pad still has a horrible smell coming from the base. I also just noticed that the product description claims that it has a rubber base. As you can plainly see from the attached photos, the one I received isn't rubber. I assume it's polyurethane, but I don't know for sure. I just know it has a strong and foul chemical odor. They need to correct the mistakes in their product description and do something about the smell coming off of this thing. I'm about to buy a new one with a rubber base. Hopefully the seller I buy the new one from doesn't call it rubber when it's not. :(3/26/2018 - The smell did eventually subside. It took a few months, but I don’t notice it anymore. I did let it air out upside-down for a couple weeks and that seemed to help some, but mostly I think it just takes time. I will definitely buy rubber next time. Also, I’m not thrilled with the faded pink color. I would have preferred a more vibrant pink. I think I’ll shop for a prettier one.Dear Seller, if you want to contact me, my email address is on my profile. I'm willing to leave a more favorable review if you can replace this with another pink mouse pad that doesn't smell.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_text: I bought the snow mountain print. This mousepad is very pretty, and looks like the picture for the most part. The print I received had more pink in the highlights, and came with a stain. The stain was nothing a little spot clean couldn't fix, but I'm not sure why the stain was there in the first place. Extra ink? Repackaged mousepad? It didn't bother me too much, but it did make me question if it was 100% new.The top material with the print is comparable to workout pants and feels nice to the touch. If I had to guess the material, I would say it's most like lycra - very soft and smooth. So far, it is very durable. No scratches or nicks on the printed area.The bottom has a nice "stick" to it. It doesn't move on hard surfaces. It is a good-sized mousepad, and my mouse glides smoothly over it. I will say that if your mouse has little "feet" to it like the Logitech wireless mice, it might stick to the mousepad material, so increasing the sensitivity of the mouse tracking might be a good solution. Luckily, I was able to try it out with two mice, and the second one didn't stick as much as the first, so I will most likely be using the second mouse with this mousepad.My one and only gripe with this product is that the wrist rest is not memory foam as advertised. It is actually gel, so it's harder than expected. It still provides good support for my wrist, so it serves its purpose for now. I just might have to get a second mousepad that is actually memory foam because gel is not very comfortable for me, especially after long periods of use.Overall, unique design and good for use in short periods of time.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_title: Really cute, very comfy, and it STICKS to your desk!
review_text: 2/12/18: I read a couple of reviews and we worried about two things: chemical smell and the “fake” rubber at the bottom. When I received the product, it cane in a clear bag. The size and design were just like the image/description—very pretty! The wrist support is gel, not too soft not too firm. It’s the right height for my hand and feels comfortable. I didn’t notice any chemical smell, which is good considering I have a small desk fan in front of the mouse pad. It didn’t spread any smell. The bottom comes with a cling wrap covering. I agree with other reviewers, it’s not really rubber but it is rubbery enough to not move AT ALL. I tried pushing it and pulling (as hard as I could) and it didn’t budge a single inch. It’s like it almost sticks to the desk (doesn’t actually stick). Five stars for the fake rubber!!! I got this for my desk at work, I’m considering getting one in a different color for home. I will update in a few months regarding: comfort ability, durability, and overall quality after use.
category: Office Products, Office & School Supplies, Desk Accessories & Workspace Organizers, Mouse Pads & Wrist Rests, Mouse Pads,

product_title: Lizimandu Non Slip Mouse Pad Wrist Rest for Office, Computer, Laptop & Mac - Durable & Comfortable & Lightweight for Easy Typing & Pain Relief-Ergonomic Support(Deer Blue)
review_title: Designs You Like Make Computer Work More Fun!
review_text: I love the gel wrist rest.  I had a purple one (my daughter came to organize Mom and I have no clue where she put it).  I ordered a black one of the same style (purple wasn't available).  I was so tired of looking at the same black mouse pad.  I ordered a pretty mouse with flowers (that is in the picture).  I picked this Rose design pad because it matched my mouse.  I am so tickled at the feminine, "all together look" of the two complimenting one another.  It's eye catching, not boring black.  I like looking at it even walking past the table.  It looks so good, it even makes me want to keep the table neat and cleaned off to be as organized as my mouse and new pad look.  It's as comfortable as the others.  I love the gel support for the wrist.  Snow is on the way again, so it's nice to have the pretty flowers to look at.  Plus, Valentine's is coming up, so it suits for February as well as spring and summer.  In winter, it's just nice to see the flowers that I don't have outside this time of year.  The colors (artwork) are detailed, bright, and shiny.  All of the flowers and leaves are two toned shades (example: the leaves are darker green on the inside and lighter green on the edges).  The 2 tone coloring of the roses makes them look real and almost 3D.  I'm very pleased.  It's a pad that catches your attention-draws your eyes to it.  I know that when my grand daughter comes to visit, she's going to say, "Nana, you got a new mouse pad.  I like it.  It's pretty".  It has the slip resistant bottom as well.  The best part was seeing the vibrancy of the colors when I saw it in the pack.  The comfort is no less than any other gel pad that I have had.  Yes, it cost $3.00 more than one with no design.  But, when you are going to look at and use something every day of the week, why not make it fun.  It's like printed paper towels versus plain white boring ones.  Again, the colors are vibrant and the gel wrist support is extremely comfortable!  Thank you for giving me every pennies worth!  Also, there are many designs to choose from that are also beautiful (mountain scenes, etc.).  I chose this one because it matched my mouse.
